trait.name: 俯衝攻擊
entries: 若阿蘭寇拉鷹人在飛行中且向一個目標直線俯衝至少30呎距離，並接著以一次近戰武器攻擊命中它，該攻擊將對目標造成額外的3 ({@dice 1d6})傷害。

action.name: 禽爪
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 召喚氣元素
entries: 五個彼此距離30呎內的阿蘭寇拉鷹人可以用魔法召喚出一個{@creature 氣元素}。這五個鷹人都必須各自在三個連續的回合使用它們的動作和移動以施展一種空中演舞，且必須在這麼做時維持專注（如同專注於一個法術）。當這五個鷹人都完成了它們在第三個回合的舞蹈，則氣元素將會出現在距離它們60呎內的一處未被佔據空間。氣元素將對它們友善，且服從它們的口頭命令。它將持續存在長達1小時，直到它或它的所有召喚者死亡，或直到它的任何召喚者以一個附贈動作解消它。召喚者直到它完成一次短休之前都無法在施展這個舞蹈。當氣元素回到其氣元素位面，任何距離它5呎內的阿蘭寇拉鷹人將可以跟著它一同返回。

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: The aboleth可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: Mucous Cloud
entries: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})鈍擊傷害。 If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by heal or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Enslave (3/Day)
entries: The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The {@condition charmed} target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The aboleth makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleth takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the yeti takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: The yeti在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) cold damage and then be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to this yeti's gaze for 1 hour.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge}
entries: The yeti exhales a 30-foot cone of frigid air. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

immune.preNote: 非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The demilich is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: The demilich emits a bloodcurdling howl. Each creature within 30 feet of the demilich that can hear the howl must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: The demilich targets up to three creatures that it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage, and the demilich regains hit points equal to the total damage dealt to all targets.

action.name: Trap Soul
entries: The demilich targets one creature that it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 19 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's soul is magically trapped inside one of the demilich's gems. While the soul is trapped, the target's body and all the equipment it is carrying cease to exist. On a successful save, the target takes 24 ({@damage 7d6}) necrotic damage, and if this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, its soul is trapped as if it failed the saving throw. A soul trapped in a gem for 24 hours is devoured and ceases to exist.

If the demilich drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed and turns to powder, leaving behind its gems. Crushing a gem releases any soul trapped within, at which point the target's body re-forms in an unoccupied space nearest to the gem and in the same state as when it was trapped.

legendary.name: Flight
entries: The demilich flies up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Cloud of Dust
entries: The demilich magically swirls its dusty remains. Each creature within 10 feet of the demilich, including around a corner, must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the demilich's next turn. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect until the end of the demilich's next turn.

legendary.name: Energy Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature with in 30 feet of the demilich must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's hit point maximum is magically reduced by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). If a creature's hit point maximum is reduced to 0 by this effect, the creature dies. A creature's hit point maximum can be restored with the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

legendary.name: Vile Curse (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The demilich targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically cursed. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the curse on a success.

monster.name: 侍僧
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

action.name: 棍棒
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4})鈍擊傷害。

monster.description: 侍僧是神職者中的初級成員，通常從屬於一名祭司。他們負責神廟裡的各種工作，並被其侍奉的神祇賦予了微弱的施法能力。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 侍僧是1級的施法者。它的施法屬性為睿知（法術豁免DC 12，法術攻擊命中{@hit 4}）。侍僧已準備了以下牧師法術：

monster.name: 成年黑龍
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 黑龍可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 若黑龍在一次豁免檢定中失敗，它可以選擇改為使其成功。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 黑龍可以使用它的駭人威儀，然後進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6})穿刺傷害加 4 ({@damage 1d8})酸蝕傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 駭人威儀
entries: 每個距離黑龍120呎內，由黑龍所選擇的且意識到其存在的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 16的睿知豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。若一個生物成功通過該豁免檢定或結束這個效果對它的影響，則該生物將在接下來的24小時內免疫此黑龍的駭人威儀。

action.name: 酸蝕吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 黑龍吐出一道60呎長，5呎寬直線型的強酸。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 18的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到54 ({@damage 12d8})酸蝕傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

legendary.name: 偵查
entries: 黑龍進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。

legendary.name: 尾擊攻擊
entries: 黑龍進行一次尾擊攻擊。

legendary.name: 振翅攻擊 (消耗 2動作)
entries: 黑龍拍打它的翅膀。每個距離黑龍10呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 19的敏捷豁免，否則受到13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})鈍擊傷害，並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。黑龍接著可以飛行最多等同它飛行速度一半的距離。

monster.name: Adult Blue Dracolich
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The dracolich 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 駭人威儀
entries: Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dracolich exhales lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 ({@damage 12d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dracolich makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dracolich makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. After beating its wings this way, the dracolich can fly up to half its flying speed.

monster.name: 成年藍龍
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 若藍龍在一次豁免檢定中失敗，它可以選擇改為使其成功。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 藍龍可以使用它的駭人威儀，然後進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 12}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7})穿刺傷害加 5 ({@damage 1d10})閃電傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 12}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 12}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 駭人威儀
entries: 每個距離藍龍120呎內，由藍龍所選擇的且意識到其存在的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 17的睿知豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。若一個生物成功通過該豁免檢定或結束這個效果對它的影響，則該生物將在接下來的24小時內免疫此藍龍的駭人威儀。

action.name: 閃電吐息{@recharge 5}
entries: 藍龍吐出一道90呎長，5呎寬直線型的閃電。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 19的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到66 ({@damage 12d10})閃電傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

legendary.name: 偵查
entries: 藍龍進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。

legendary.name: 尾擊攻擊
entries: 藍龍進行一次尾擊攻擊。

legendary.name: 振翅攻擊 (消耗 2動作)
entries: 藍龍拍打它的翅膀。每個距離藍龍10呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 20的敏捷豁免，否則受到14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7})鈍擊傷害，並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。藍龍接著可以飛行最多等同它飛行速度一半的距離。

monster.name: Adult Brass Dragon
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 若黃銅龍在一次豁免檢定中失敗，它可以選擇改為使其成功。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 黃銅龍可以使用它的駭人威儀，然後進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 吐息武器 {@recharge 5}
entries: 黃銅龍使用以下其中一種吐息武器。

items.name: 火焰吐息：
items.entry: 黃銅龍吐出一道60呎長，5呎寬直線型的烈焰。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 18的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到45 ({@damage 13d6})火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

items.name: 催眠吐息：
items.entry: 黃銅龍吐出一道60呎錐形的催眠毒氣。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 18的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態長達10分鐘。這個效果對一個生物的影響會在該生物受到傷害、或其他人使用一個動作將它叫醒時結束。

legendary.name: 偵查
entries: 黃銅龍進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。

legendary.name: 尾擊攻擊
entries: 黃銅龍進行一次尾擊攻擊。

legendary.name: 振翅攻擊 (消耗 2動作)
entries: 黃銅龍拍打它的翅膀。每個距離黃銅龍10呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 19的敏捷豁免，否則受到13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})鈍擊傷害，並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。黃銅龍接著可以飛行最多等同它飛行速度一半的距離。

monster.name: Adult Bronze Dragon
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 青銅龍可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 若青銅龍在一次豁免檢定中失敗，它可以選擇改為使其成功。

action.name: 駭人威儀

action.name: 吐息武器 {@recharge 5}
entries: 青銅龍使用以下其中一種吐息武器。

items.name: 閃電吐息：
items.entry: 青銅龍吐出一道90呎長，5呎寬直線型的閃電。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 19的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到66 ({@damage 12d10})閃電傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

items.name: 斥力吐息：
items.entry: 青銅龍吐出一道30呎錐形的推斥能量。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 19的力量豁免。若豁免失敗，該生物將被推離青銅龍60呎距離。

action.name: 變形
entries: 青銅龍可以用魔法變形成一個挑戰等級不高於自己的類人生物或野獸，或變回它的真實型態。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備將會被新形態吸收或適應於新型態（由青銅龍選擇）。
在新型態中，青銅龍保留它的陣營、生命值、生命骰、說話能力、熟練項、傳奇抗性、巢穴動作、它的智力、睿知、魅力屬性值、以及這個動作。它除此之外的數據和能力將被新型態給取代，但不包括新型態的職業能力或傳奇動作。

legendary.name: 偵查
entries: 青銅龍進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。

legendary.name: 尾擊攻擊
entries: 青銅龍進行一次尾擊攻擊。

legendary.name: 振翅攻擊 (消耗 2動作)
entries: 青銅龍拍打它的翅膀。每個距離青銅龍10呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 20的敏捷豁免，否則受到14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7})鈍擊傷害，並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。青銅龍接著可以飛行最多等同它飛行速度一半的距離。

monster.name: Adult Copper Dragon
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 若赤銅龍在一次豁免檢定中失敗，它可以選擇改為使其成功。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 赤銅龍可以使用它的駭人威儀，然後進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 駭人威儀
entries: 每個距離赤銅龍120呎內，由赤銅龍所選擇的且意識到其存在的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 16的睿知豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。若一個生物成功通過該豁免檢定或結束這個效果對它的影響，則該生物將在接下來的24小時內免疫此赤銅龍的駭人威儀。

action.name: 吐息武器 {@recharge 5}
entries: 赤銅龍使用以下其中一種吐息武器。

items.name: 酸蝕吐息：
items.entry: 赤銅龍吐出一道60呎長，5呎寬直線型的酸液。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 18的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到54 ({@damage 12d8})酸蝕傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

items.name: 緩速吐息：
items.entry: 赤銅龍吐出一道60呎錐形的毒氣。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 18的體質豁免。若豁免失敗，則該生物將無法採取反應、移動速度減半、且在它的回合不能進行超過一次的攻擊。此外，該生物在它的回合只能使用一個動作或一個附贈動作，而不能在同一回合使用兩者。這個效果持續長達1分鐘。該生物可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

legendary.name: 偵查
entries: 赤銅龍進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。

legendary.name: 尾擊攻擊
entries: 赤銅龍進行一次尾擊攻擊。

legendary.name: 振翅攻擊 (消耗 2動作)
entries: 赤銅龍拍打它的翅膀。每個距離赤銅龍10呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 19的敏捷豁免，否則受到13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})鈍擊傷害，並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。赤銅龍接著可以飛行最多等同它飛行速度一半的距離。

在新型態中，金龍保留它的陣營、生命值、生命骰、說話能力、熟練項、傳奇抗性、巢穴動作、它的智力、睿知、魅力屬性值、以及這個動作。它除此之外的數據和能力將被新型態給取代，但不包括新型態的職業能力或傳奇動作。

entries: 每個距離白龍120呎內，由白龍所選擇的且意識到其存在的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 14的睿知豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。若一個生物成功通過該豁免檢定或結束這個效果對它的影響，則該生物將在接下來的24小時內免疫此白龍的駭人威儀。

action.name: 寒冰吐息{@recharge 5}
entries: 白龍吐出一道60呎錐形的冰雪爆風。每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 19的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到54 ({@damage 12d8})寒冰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

legendary.name: 偵查
entries: 白龍進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。

legendary.name: 尾擊攻擊
entries: 白龍進行一次尾擊攻擊。

legendary.name: 振翅攻擊 (消耗 2動作)
entries: 白龍拍打它的翅膀。每個距離白龍10呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 19的敏捷豁免，否則受到13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})鈍擊傷害，並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。白龍接著可以飛行最多等同它飛行速度一半的距離。

trait.name: 氣態形體
entries: 氣元素可以進入一個敵對生物所在的空間並在該處停下。它也可以移動穿越最窄1吋的狹窄空間而不用擠縮身體。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 氣元素進行二次猛擊攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 旋風 {@recharge 4}
entries: 每個在氣元素所在空間的生物都必須進行一次DC 13的力量豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將受到15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2})鈍擊傷害，被向隨機方向拋離氣元素最多20呎距離，並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。若被拋飛的目標撞上了一個物體，像是牆壁或地面，則該生物每被拋離10呎，它就會受到3 ({@damage 1d6})鈍擊傷害。若目標被拋向另一個生物，則該生物必須成功通過一次DC 13的敏捷豁免，否則受到相同的傷害並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。
若豁免成功，目標將只受到一半的鈍擊傷害，且不會被拋飛或被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 猛撲
entries: 若異特龍向著一個生物直線移動至少30呎並接著在同回合以一次爪抓攻擊命中它，則目標必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。若目標{@condition 伏地}，則異特龍能夠以一次附贈動作對它進行一次啃咬攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})劈砍傷害。

monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 黑龍可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 黑龍可以使用它的駭人威儀，然後進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 15}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8})穿刺傷害加 9 ({@damage 2d8})酸蝕傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 15}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 15}，觸及20呎，單一目標。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 駭人威儀
entries: 每個距離黑龍120呎內，由黑龍所選擇的且意識到其存在的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 19的睿知豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。若一個生物成功通過該豁免檢定或結束這個效果對它的影響，則該生物將在接下來的24小時內免疫此黑龍的駭人威儀。

entries: 黑龍吐出一道90呎長，10呎寬直線型的強酸。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 22的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到67 ({@damage 15d8})酸蝕傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

action.name: 吐息武器 {@recharge 5}
entries: 黃銅龍使用以下其中一種吐息武器。

items.name: 火焰吐息：
items.entry: 黃銅龍吐出一道90呎長，10呎寬直線型的烈焰。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 21的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到56 ({@damage 16d6})火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

items.name: 催眠吐息：
items.entry: 黃銅龍吐出一道90呎錐形的催眠毒氣。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 21的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態長達10分鐘。這個效果對一個生物的影響會在該生物受到傷害、或其他人使用一個動作將它叫醒時結束。

action.name: 變形
entries: 黃銅龍可以用魔法變形成一個挑戰等級不高於自己的類人生物或野獸，或變回它的真實型態。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備將會被新形態吸收或適應於新型態（由黃銅龍選擇）。
在新型態中，黃銅龍保留它的陣營、生命值、生命骰、說話能力、熟練項、傳奇抗性、巢穴動作、它的智力、睿知、魅力屬性值、以及這個動作。它除此之外的數據和能力將被新型態給取代，但不包括新型態的職業能力或傳奇動作。

entries: 黃銅龍進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。

legendary.name: 尾擊攻擊

action.name: 變形
entries: 赤銅龍可以用魔法變形成一個挑戰等級不高於自己的類人生物或野獸，或變回它的真實型態。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備將會被新形態吸收或適應於新型態（由赤銅龍選擇）。
在新型態中，赤銅龍保留它的陣營、生命值、生命骰、說話能力、熟練項、傳奇抗性、巢穴動作、它的智力、睿知、魅力屬性值、以及這個動作。它除此之外的數據和能力將被新型態給取代，但不包括新型態的職業能力或傳奇動作。

legendary.name: 偵查
entries: 赤銅龍進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。

legendary.name: 尾擊攻擊
entries: 赤銅龍進行一次尾擊攻擊。

legendary.name: 振翅攻擊 (消耗 2動作)
entries: 赤銅龍拍打它的翅膀。每個距離青銅龍15呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 23的敏捷豁免，否則受到15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8})鈍擊傷害，並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。赤銅龍接著可以飛行最多等同它飛行速度一半的距離。

monster.name: Ancient Gold Dragon
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 金龍可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 若金龍在一次豁免檢定中失敗，它可以選擇改為使其成功。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 金龍可以使用它的駭人威儀，然後進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 17}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 17}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 17}，觸及20呎，單一目標。{@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 駭人威儀
entries: 每個距離金龍120呎內，由金龍所選擇的且意識到其存在的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 24的睿知豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。若一個生物成功通過該豁免檢定或結束這個效果對它的影響，則該生物將在接下來的24小時內免疫此金龍的駭人威儀。

action.name: 吐息武器 {@recharge 5}
entries: 金龍使用以下其中一種吐息武器。

items.name: 火焰吐息：
items.entry: 金龍吐出一道90呎錐形的烈焰。每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 24的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到71 ({@damage 13d10})火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

items.name: 弱化吐息：
items.entry: 金龍吐出一道90呎錐形的毒氣。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 24的力量豁免，否則在基於力量的攻擊檢定、力量檢定、和力量豁免中承受劣勢長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

action.name: 變形
entries: 金龍可以用魔法變形成一個挑戰等級不高於自己的類人生物或野獸，或變回它的真實型態。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備將會被新形態吸收或適應於新型態（由金龍選擇）。
在新型態中，金龍保留它的陣營、生命值、生命骰、說話能力、熟練項、傳奇抗性、巢穴動作、它的智力、睿知、魅力屬性值、以及這個動作。它除此之外的數據和能力將被新型態給取代，但不包括新型態的職業能力或傳奇動作。

entries: 金龍進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。

legendary.name: 尾擊攻擊
entries: 金龍進行一次尾擊攻擊。

trait.name: 冰上行走
entries: 白龍可以移動穿過或攀爬冰面而無須進行屬性檢定。此外，冰或雪構成的困難地形不會使它消耗額外的移動速度。

immune.preNote: 非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 12}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Roar (3/Day)
entries: The sphinx emits a magical roar. Each time it roars before finishing a long rest, the roar is louder and the effect is different, as detailed below. Each creature within 500 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the roar must make a saving throw.

items.name: First Roar
items.entry: Each creature that fails a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: Second Roar
items.entry: Each creature that fails a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw is {@condition deafened} and {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature is {@condition paralyzed} and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: Third Roar
items.entry: Each creature makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) thunder damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sphinx is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following cleric spells prepared:

monster.name: 活化盔甲
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 反魔法敏感
entries: 當處於{@spell 反魔法結界}的效果範圍時，活化盔甲將陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。若它被做為{@spell 解除魔法}的目標，活化盔甲必須成功通過一次對抗施法者法術豁免DC的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態持續1分鐘。

trait.name: 擬形
entries: 當活化盔甲保持不動，它看起來就跟普通的盔甲一模一樣。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 活化盔甲進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 30 ft. long and 5 ft. wide, provided that it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 14的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 猿進行二次拳擊攻擊。

action.name: 拳擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 投石
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 5}，射程25/50呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The arcanaloth 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The arcanaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3})劈砍傷害。 The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The arcanaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day)
entries: The yugoloth attempts a magical summoning.
An arcanaloth has a {@chance 40|40 percent|40% summoning chance} chance of summoning one arcanaloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The arcanaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). The arcanaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The arcanaloth is a 16th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The arcanaloth has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 大法師在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 大法師是18級的施法者。它的施法屬性為智力（法術豁免DC 17，法術攻擊命中{@hit 9}）。大法師可以隨意施放{@spell 易容術}和{@spell 隱形術}，且已準備了以下法師法術：
footerEntries: *大法師會在戰鬥之前對自己施放這些法術。

monster.name: 刺客
monster.languages: 竊賊黑話、和任意兩種語言

trait.name: 刺殺
entries: 在它的第一個回合期間，刺客對任何尚未採取過回合的生物所進行的攻擊檢定具有優勢。且刺客任何命中被突襲生物的攻擊都視為暴擊。

trait.name: 反射閃避
entries: 若刺客成為一個允許它進行敏捷豁免以僅承受一半傷害的效果的目標，則刺客可以改為在豁免成功時不受任何傷害，且在豁免失敗時僅承受一半傷害。

trait.name: 偷襲 (1/回合)
entries: 當刺客以武器攻擊命中一個目標時，若該攻擊檢定具有優勢，或者該攻擊檢定沒有劣勢且刺客有一個未{@condition 無力}的隊友距離目標5呎內，則刺客造成額外的14 ({@dice 4d6})傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 刺客進行二次短劍攻擊。

action.name: 短劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害，且目標必須進行一次DC 15的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到24 ({@damage 7d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

action.name: 輕弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 6}，射程80/320呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺傷害，且目標必須進行一次DC 15的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到24 ({@damage 7d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

monster.name: 啟蒙灌木
monster.languages: 一個它創造者所知曉的語言

trait.name: 擬形
entries: 當啟蒙灌木保持不動，它看起來就跟普通的灌木叢一模一樣。

action.name: 刮掠
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 1}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1})劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 啟蒙樹木
monster.languages: 一個它創造者所知曉的語言

trait.name: 擬形
entries: 當啟蒙樹木保持不動，它看起來就跟普通的樹木一模一樣。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 ft..

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若狒狒有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則狒狒在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 1}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 獾在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 焚身爆
entries: 當巴洛炎魔死亡時，它將會爆炸，且每個距離它30呎內的生物都必須進行一次DC 20的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到70 ({@damage 20d6})火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。這個爆炸會點燃範圍內所有未被穿戴或攜帶的可燃物體，並摧毀巴洛炎魔的武器。

trait.name: 火焰靈光
entries: 在巴洛炎魔的每個回合開始時，每個距離它5呎內的生物都將受到10 ({@damage 3d6})火焰傷害，且所有在靈光中未被穿戴或攜帶的可燃物體也都將被點燃。一個觸碰巴洛炎魔或在距離它5呎內以一次近戰攻擊命中它的生物將受到10 ({@damage 3d6})火焰傷害。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 巴洛炎魔在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 魔法武器
entries: 巴洛炎魔的武器攻擊視作魔法攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 巴洛炎魔進行二次攻擊：一次長劍，一次鞭。

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 14}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8})劈砍傷害加 13 ({@damage 3d8})閃電傷害。若巴洛炎魔造成重擊，則它將骰三次傷害骰，而非原本的二次。

action.name: 鞭
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 14}，觸及30呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8})劈砍傷害加 10 ({@damage 3d6})火焰傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 20的力量豁免，否則被拉向巴洛炎魔最多25呎距離。

action.name: 傳送
entries: 巴洛炎魔用魔法將自己連同任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備一起傳送最多120呎距離到一處它所能看見的未被佔據空間。

variant.name: 召喚惡魔 (1/日)
entries: 該惡魔選擇要召喚什麼，並嘗試進行一次魔法召喚。

一個巴洛炎魔有{@chance 50|50％|50％召喚機率}機率召喚出、{@dice 1d8}個{@creature 弗洛魔|mm}、{@dice 1d6}個{@creature 狂戰魔|mm}、{@dice 1d4}個{@creature 迷誘魔|mm}、{@dice 1d3}個{@creature 判魂魔|mm}、{@dice 1d2}個{@creature 六臂蛇魔|mm}、或一個{@creature 巨牛魔}。
被召喚的惡魔將出現距離它召喚者60呎內的一處未被佔據空間，做為召喚者的盟友行動，且不能再召喚其它惡魔。它會持續存在長達1分鐘，直到它或它的召喚者死亡、或直到召喚者以一個動作解消它。

monster.name: 強盜
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 輕弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程80/320呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 首領進行三次近戰攻擊：二次彎刀、一次匕首。或者首領使用匕首進行二次遠程攻擊。

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害。

reaction.name: 格擋
entries: 首領在一次近戰攻擊將要命中它時可以針對該次攻擊使它的AC增加2點。若要這麼做，首領必須要能看見攻擊者且正持用一把近戰武器。

trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The banshee can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

action.name: Corrupting Touch
entries: {@atk ms} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Wail (1/Day)
entries: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

resist.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: 刺針猬皮
entries: 在它的每個回合開始時，猬魔對任何擒抱它的生物造成5 ({@damage 1d10})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙猬魔的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 猬魔在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 猬魔進行三次近戰攻擊：一次尾擊，二次爪抓。或者，它可以使用二次投擲烈焰。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 投擲烈焰
entries: {@atk rs} 命中{@hit 5}，射程150呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d6})火焰傷害。若目標為未被穿戴或攜帶的可燃物體，則它將被點燃。

monster.name: 巴古拉魔
monster.senses: 盲視30呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 魯莽
entries: 在它的回合開始時，巴古拉魔可以讓它在該回合間進行的所有近戰武器攻擊具有優勢，但直到它的下個回合開始前，所有對它進行的攻擊檢定也都具有優勢。

trait.name: 助跑跳躍
entries: 巴古拉魔在助跑後可以跳遠最多40呎距離，且跳高最多20呎距離。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 巴古拉魔進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次拳擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 拳擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 巴古拉魔的天生施法屬性為睿知（法術豁免DC 13）。巴古拉魔天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

variant.name: 召喚惡魔 (1/日)
entries: 該惡魔選擇要召喚什麼，並嘗試進行一次魔法召喚。
一個巴古拉魔有{@chance 30|30％|30％召喚機率}機率召喚出另一個巴古拉魔。
被召喚的惡魔將出現距離它召喚者60呎內的一處未被佔據空間，做為召喚者的盟友行動，且不能再召喚其它惡魔。它會持續存在長達1分鐘，直到它或它的召喚者死亡、或直到召喚者以一個動作解消它。

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk and the two of them can see each other, the basilisk can force the creature to make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw if the basilisk isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the basilisk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the basilisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the basilisk sees its reflection within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: 回聲定位
entries: 蝙蝠在{@condition 耳聾}時無法使用牠的盲視。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺
entries: 蝙蝠在依賴聽覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 0}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}1 穿刺傷害。

resist.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙鬚魔的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 鬚魔在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 堅定
entries: 當鬚魔可以看見距離它30呎內的友方生物時，它不會陷入{@condition 恐懼}。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 鬚魔進行二次攻擊：一次蛇鬚，一次長柄刀。

action.name: 蛇鬚
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 12的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1分鐘。當因此而{@condition 中毒}時，目標無法回復生命值。目標可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

action.name: 長柄刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})劈砍傷害。若目標為一個不死生物或構裝體以外的生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 12的體質豁免，否則將在它的每個回合開始時因為煉獄創傷而失去5 ({@dice 1d10})點生命值。每當鬚魔使用此攻擊命中一個帶有該創傷的生物，這個創傷造成的傷害將會增加5 ({@dice 1d10})點。任何生物都可以使用一個動作，透過成功通過一次DC 12的睿知（{@skill 醫藥}）檢定以為創傷止血。這個創傷也會在目標被魔法治療的時候癒合。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6})劈砍傷害。 The target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 16) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 ({@damage 12d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 ft. of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The beholder's central eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the {@spell antimagic field} spell, in a 150-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active. The area works against the beholder's own eye rays.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The beholder shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:
1. Charm Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the beholder for 1 hour, or until the beholder harms the creature.

2. Paralyzing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

3. Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

4. Slowing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
5. Enervation Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

6. Telekinetic Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or the beholder moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the beholder's next turn or until the beholder is {@condition incapacitated}.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The beholder can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

7. Sleep Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep and remain {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

8. Petrification Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

9. Disintegration Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.
10. Death Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The beholder uses one random eye ray.

monster.name: Beholder Zombie
monster.languages: understands Deep Speech and Undercommon but can't speak

trait.name: 不死韌性
entries: 若殭屍因受到傷害而使生命值歸零，除非該傷害為光耀傷害或來自重擊，否則它必須進行一次DC 5+所受傷害值的體質豁免。若豁免成功，則改為將它的生命值減少至1。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Eye Ray
entries: The zombie uses a random magical eye ray, choosing a target that it can see within 60 feet of it.

1. Paralyzing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

2. Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
3. Enervation Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

4. Disintegration Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger nonmagical object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

monster.name: 狂戰士
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

trait.name: 魯莽
entries: 在它的回合開始時，狂戰士可以讓它在該回合間進行的所有近戰武器攻擊具有優勢，但直到它的下個回合開始前，所有對它進行的攻擊檢定也都具有優勢。

action.name: 巨斧
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 熊在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 熊進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) 穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) 劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 黑龍幼龍
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 黑龍可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害加 2 ({@damage 1d4})酸蝕傷害。

action.name: 酸蝕吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 黑龍吐出一道15呎長，5呎寬直線型的強酸。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 11的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到22 ({@damage 5d8})酸蝕傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

monster.name: 黑布丁
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 無定形
entries: 黑布丁可以移動穿越最窄1吋的狹窄空間而不用擠縮身體。

trait.name: 腐蝕形態
entries: 一個觸碰黑布丁或在距離它5呎內時以近戰攻擊命中它的生物將受到4 ({@damage 1d8})酸蝕傷害。任何金屬或木質製成的非魔法武器會在命中黑布丁時被腐蝕。在造成傷害之後，該武器的傷害骰將受到一個永久且可累積的−1罰值。若該罰值累積至−5，則該武器被摧毀。金屬或木質製成的非魔法彈藥會在命中黑布丁時並造成傷害後被摧毀。黑布丁可以在1輪內吃掉2吋厚、非魔法的木質或金屬。

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: 黑布丁可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

action.name: 偽足
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害加 18 ({@damage 4d8})酸蝕傷害。此外，目標穿著的非魔法護甲將被部分溶解，並它所提供的AC將受到永久且可累積的−1罰值。若它的AC被此罰值減至10，則該護甲被摧毀。

reaction.name: 分裂
entries: 當一個體型為中型或更大的黑布丁受到閃電或劈砍傷害，若它擁有至少10點生命值，則它將分裂成兩個新的黑布丁。每個新的黑布丁具有等同於原本黑布丁一半的生命值，向下取整。新的黑布丁的體型比原本黑布丁的體型小一級。

monster.name: 閃現犬
monster.languages: 閃現犬理解木族語，但不會說

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 閃現犬在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 傳送 {@recharge 4}
entries: 閃現犬用魔法將自己連同任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備一起傳送到最多40呎外一處它所能看見的未被佔據空間。閃現犬可以在傳送之前或之後進行一次啃咬攻擊。

trait.name: 敏銳視覺
entries: 血鷹在依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若血鷹有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則血鷹在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 藍龍幼龍
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})穿刺傷害加 3 ({@damage 1d6})閃電傷害。

action.name: 閃電吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 藍龍吐出一道30呎長，5呎寬直線型的閃電。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 12的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到22 ({@damage 4d10})閃電傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The slaad 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})劈砍傷害。 If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease called chaos phage. While infected, the target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) every 24 hours. If the disease reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target instantly transforms into a red slaad or, if it has the ability to cast spells of 3rd level or higher, a green slaad. Only a wish spell can reverse the transformation.

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition charmed} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell imprisonment}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell wish} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell 高等復原術} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitated} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage to the slaad.

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若野豬向著一個目標直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次獠牙攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的3 ({@damage 1d6})劈砍傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 11的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 頑強 (短休或長休之後充能)
entries: 若野豬受到7點或更低的傷害而使其生命值歸零，則改為將它的生命值減少至1。

action.name: 獠牙
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})劈砍傷害。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙devil的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The devil 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The devil makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

variant.name: Bone Devil Polearm
entries: Some bone devils have the following action options.

entries.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its hooked polearm and one with its sting.

entries.name: Hooked Polearm
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}17 ({@dice 2d12 + 4})穿刺傷害。 If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the devil can't use its polearm on another target.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster (spell save DC 12, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence, and it has the following wizard spells prepared:

monster.name: 黃銅龍幼龍
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 吐息武器 {@recharge 5}
entries: 黃銅龍使用以下其中一種吐息武器。

items.name: 火焰吐息：
items.entry: 黃銅龍吐出一道20呎長，5呎寬直線型的烈焰。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 11的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到14 ({@damage 4d6})火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

items.name: 催眠吐息：
items.entry: 黃銅龍吐出一道15呎錐形的催眠毒氣。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 11的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態長達1分鐘。這個效果對一個生物的影響會在該生物受到傷害、或其他人使用一個動作將它叫醒時結束。

action.name: 啃咬

action.name: 吐息武器 {@recharge 5}
entries: 青銅龍使用以下其中一種吐息武器。

items.name: 閃電吐息：
items.entry: 青銅龍吐出一道40呎長，5呎寬直線型的閃電。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 12的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到16 ({@damage 3d10})閃電傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

items.name: 斥力吐息：
items.entry: 青銅龍吐出一道30呎錐形的推斥能量。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 12的力量豁免。若豁免失敗，該生物將被推離青銅龍30呎距離。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 熊在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 熊進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次爪抓。

entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 殘暴
entries: 一把近戰武器會在熊地精用它命中目標時造成一顆額外的傷害骰（已包含在攻擊條目）。

trait.name: 突襲攻擊
entries: 若熊地精突襲一個生物並在戰鬥第一輪的期間以一次攻擊命中它，則目標將在該次攻擊中受到額外的7 ({@dice 2d6})傷害。

action.name: 釘頭錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}近戰時 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})穿刺傷害或遠程時 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 殘暴
