trait.name: 突襲攻擊
entries: 若熊地精突襲一個生物並在戰鬥第一輪的期間以一次攻擊命中它，則目標將在該次攻擊中受到額外的7 ({@dice 2d6})傷害。

trait.name: 赫魯格克之心
entries: 熊地精在對抗{@condition 魅惑}、{@condition 恐懼}、{@condition 麻痺}、{@condition 中毒}、{@condition 震懾}、或使之入睡的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 熊地精進行二次近戰攻擊

action.name: 釘頭錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}近戰時 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})穿刺傷害或遠程時 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 ft. and its high jump is up to 15 ft., with or without a running start.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the bulette jumps at least 15 ft. as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a DC 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。 On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 ft. out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the bulette's space.

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 狂蛙人可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: 蛙類交談
entries: 狂蛙人可以使用狂蛙人語對青蛙與蟾蜍進行簡單概念的溝通。

trait.name: 沼澤偽裝
entries: 狂蛙人在沼澤地形為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 立定跳躍
entries: 狂蛙人的跳遠距離最多20呎、且跳高距離最多10呎，無論有沒有助跑都一樣。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 狂蛙人進行二次近戰攻擊：一次啃咬，一次矛。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The cambion makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One humanoid the cambion can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The cambion's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The cambion can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: The carrion crawler在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: carrion crawler可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The carrion crawler makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 貓在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 0}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 熊在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 熊進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若centaur向著一個目標直線移動至少30呎並接著在同回合以一次pike攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的10 ({@damage 3d6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 長弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙devil的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The devil 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The devil makes two attacks with its chains.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。 The target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Up to four chains the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under the devil's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried.

Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points or if the devil is {@condition incapacitated} or dies.

reaction.name: Unnerving Mask
entries: When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its turn.

monster.name: 喀嘶魔
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 蜂鳴噪音
entries: 喀嘶魔製造出被惡魔免疫的可怕蜂鳴噪音。任何其他在距離喀嘶魔30呎內開始它回合的生物必須成功通過一次DC 12的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 昏迷}長達10分鐘。一個無法聽見蜂鳴聲的生物將自動通過這個豁免。若該生物受到傷害、獲若另一個生物使用一個動作以將{@item 聖水(扁瓶裝)|phb|聖水}灑在該生物身上，則這個效果對它的影響結束。若一個生物成功通過此豁免檢定或終止了這個效果對它的影響，則它將在接下來24小時內免疫於這個蜂鳴噪音。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 喀嘶魔在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: 喀嘶魔可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

action.name: 刺喙
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2})穿刺傷害加 24 ({@damage 7d6})死靈傷害，且目標的生命值最大值將減少等同於所受死靈傷害的數值。若這個效果將一個生物的生命值最大值歸零，則該生物死亡。這個生命值最大值的減損持續直到該生物完成一次長休，或被像是{@spell 高等復原術}的法術給移除。

variant.name: 召喚惡魔 (1/日)
entries: 該惡魔選擇要召喚什麼，並嘗試進行一次魔法召喚。
一個喀嘶魔有{@chance 30|30％|30％召喚機率}機率召喚出另一個喀嘶魔。
被召喚的惡魔將出現距離它召喚者60呎內的一處未被佔據空間，做為召喚者的盟友行動，且不能再召喚其它惡魔。它會持續存在長達1分鐘，直到它或它的召喚者死亡、或直到召喚者以一個動作解消它。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Chuul
monster.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: The chuul可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: Sense Magic
entries: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The chuul makes two pincer attacks. If the chuul is grappling a creature, the chuul can also use its tentacles once.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。 The target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the chuul doesn't have two other creatures {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the chuul must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: 黏土魔像

immune.preNote: 非精金武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: 理解它製造者所掌握的語言，但不會說

trait.name: 酸蝕吸收
entries: 每當魔像承受酸蝕傷害時，它並不會受到任何傷害，反而會回復等同於所受到酸蝕傷害數值的生命值。

trait.name: 狂暴
entries: 每當魔像以60點或更低生命值的情況開始它的回合，骰一顆{@dice d6}。若骰出的結果為6，則魔像將開始狂暴。在它狂暴期間的每個回合，魔像將會攻擊距離它最近且它能看見的生物。如果沒有任何生物位於它移動並攻擊的範圍內，則魔像將會攻擊一個物體，並優先選擇比自己體型更小的物體。一旦魔像開始狂暴，它將會一直持續狂暴直到它被摧毀，或回復它所有的生命值。

trait.name: 不變形態
entries: 魔像免疫於任何會改變它形態的法術或效果。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 魔像在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 魔法武器
entries: 魔像的武器攻擊視作魔法攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 魔像進行二次猛擊攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則它的生命值最大值將減少等同於所受傷害的數值。若這個攻擊將目標的生命值最大值歸零，則目標死亡。這個減損持續直到被{@spell 高等復原術}法術或其他魔法給移除。

action.name: 加速 {@recharge 5}
entries: 直到它的下個回合結束前，魔像將以魔法使自己的AC獲得+2加值，在敏捷豁免中具有優勢，且能夠以一個附贈動作使用它的猛擊攻擊﹒

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down). and that creature takes the other half.

trait.name: 擬形
entries: While the cloaker remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The cloaker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the cloaker attaches to it. If the cloaker has advantage against the target, the cloaker attaches to the target's head, and the target is {@condition blinded} and unable to breathe while the cloaker is attached. While attached, the cloaker can make this attack only against the target and has advantage on the attack roll. The cloaker can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can take its action to detach the cloaker by succeeding on a DC 16 Strength check.

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Moan
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker that can hear its moan and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the cloaker's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the cloaker's moan for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Phantasms (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The cloaker magically creates three illusory duplicates of itself if it isn't in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker is the real one. If the cloaker is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear.

Whenever any creature targets the cloaker with an attack or a harmful spell while a duplicate remains, that creature rolls randomly to determine whether it targets the cloaker or one of the duplicates. A creature is unaffected by this magical effect if it can't see or if it relies on senses other than sight.
A duplicate has the cloaker's AC and uses its saving throws. If an attack hits a duplicate, or if a duplicate fails a saving throw against an effect that deals damage, the duplicate disappears.

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 巨人在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 巨人進行二次釘頭錘攻擊。

action.name: 釘頭錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 12}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 投石
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 12}，射程60/240呎，單一目標。{@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8})鈍擊傷害。

variant.name: 新巨人選項
entries: 有些成年的雲巨人擁有魔法能力以在它們周遭創造出風力屏障，偏轉射來的投射物。其他雲巨人則喜歡將敵人拋向空中。這些能力透過下列動作選項呈現。

entries.name: 拋擲
entries: 巨人嘗試將一個距離它10呎內且體型為小型或中型的生物丟出去。目標必須成功通過一次DC 20的敏捷豁免，否則將被向著巨人所選的方向拋擲並水平飛出最多60呎距離，以{@condition 伏地}狀態著地，並受到被扔出每10呎距離4 ({@damage 1d8})的鈍擊傷害。

entries.name: 狂風靈光
entries: 一道魔法性的狂風靈光環繞著巨人。這道靈光是一個10呎半徑的球體，並只要巨人維持對它的專注就能持續存在（如同專注於法術）。當這道靈光發揮效果時，巨人對遠程武器攻擊的AC將獲得+2加值，且靈光內除了魔法火焰之外的所有未受保護的火焰都將被熄滅。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 巨人的天生施法屬性為魅力。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 11的體質豁免以抵抗不被魔法石化。若豁免失敗，該生物將會開始轉變成石頭並因此被{@condition 束縛}。它必須在它的下個回合結束時重複進行這個檢定。若豁免成功，則此效果結束。若豁免失敗，則該生物將被{@condition 石化}持續24小時。

monster.name: 平民
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

action.name: 棍棒
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 絞纏
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})鈍擊傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 14)。直到擒抱結束前，該生物被{@condition 束縛}，且蟒蛇不能絞纏另一個目標。

monster.name: 赤銅龍幼龍
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 吐息武器 {@recharge 5}
entries: 赤銅龍使用以下其中一種吐息武器。

items.name: 酸蝕吐息：
items.entry: 赤銅龍吐出一道20呎長，5呎寬直線型的酸液。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 11的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到18 ({@damage 4d8})酸蝕傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

items.name: 緩速吐息：
items.entry: 赤銅龍吐出一道15呎錐形的毒氣。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 11的體質豁免。若豁免失敗，則該生物將無法採取反應、移動速度減半、且在它的回合不能進行超過一次的攻擊。此外，該生物在它的回合只能使用一個動作或一個附贈動作，而不能在同一回合使用兩者。這個效果持續長達1分鐘。該生物可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

immune.preNote: 非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shielded Mind
entries: The couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition unconscious}. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The couatl magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the couatl's choice).

In a new form, the couatl retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, the couatl can use its bite in that form.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The couatl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 蟹可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 鉗擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 0}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 鈍擊傷害。

monster.name: 蠕行之爪
monster.senses: 盲視30呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 驅散免疫
entries: 蠕行之爪免疫於驅散不死的效果。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})鈍擊傷害或劈砍傷害（由蠕行之爪決定）。

trait.name: 屏息
entries: 鱷魚可以屏住牠的呼吸長達15分鐘。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 12)。直到擒抱結束前，該生物被{@condition 束縛}，且鱷魚不能啃咬另一個目標。

monster.name: 邪教狂信徒
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

trait.name: 黑暗忠誠
entries: 狂信徒在對抗{@condition 魅惑}或{@condition 恐懼}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 狂信徒進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 狂信徒是4級的施法者。它的施法屬性為睿知（法術豁免DC 11，法術攻擊命中{@hit 3}）。狂信徒已準備了以下牧師法術：

monster.name: 邪教徒
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

trait.name: 黑暗忠誠
entries: 邪教徒在對抗{@condition 魅惑}或{@condition 恐懼}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 ft. away.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: 巨棍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 9}，射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The dao can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the dao doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the dao dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the dao was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The dao has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The Dao makes two fist attacks or two maul attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6})鈍擊傷害。 If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength check or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The dao's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1e: {@spell 召喚元素生物} (earth elemental only)

variant.name: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance or the nature of reality.

Disguises. Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the disguise self spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the true polymorph spell one to three times per day, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.

Wishes. The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (usually 1 year). and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the wish spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's nature, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is usually crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

trait.name: 回聲定位
entries: The darkmantle在{@condition 耳聾}時無法使用牠的盲視。

trait.name: 擬形
entries: While the darkmantle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite.

action.name: Crush
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the darkmantle attaches to the target. If the target is Medium or smaller and the darkmantle has advantage on the attack roll, it attaches by engulfing the target's head, and the target is also {@condition blinded} and unable to breathe while the darkmantle is attached in this way.

While attached to the target, the darkmantle can attack no other creature except the target but has advantage on its attack rolls. The darkmantle's speed also becomes 0, it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed, and it moves with the target.
A creature can detach the darkmantle by making a successful DC 13 Strength check as an action. On its turn, the darkmantle can detach itself from the target by using 5 feet of movement.

action.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
entries: A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends out from the darkmantle, moves with it, and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as the darkmantle maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell). Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

trait.name: Two-Headed
entries: The dog has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The dog makes two bite attacks.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。 If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A death knight doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The death knight 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Marshal Undead
entries: Unless the death knight is {@condition incapacitated}, it and undead creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The death knight makes three longsword attacks.

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Hellfire Orb (1/Day)
entries: The death knight hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage and 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the death knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The death knight is a 19th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

monster.name: Death Slaad
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The slaad 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The slaad's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or greatsword.

action.name: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claws (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: 巨劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition charmed} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell imprisonment}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell wish} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell 高等復原術} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitated} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage to the slaad.

trait.name: Negative Energy Cone
entries: The death tyrant's central eye emits an invisible, magical 150-foot cone of negative energy. At the start of each of its turns, the tyrant decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

Any creature in that area can't regain hit points. Any humanoid that dies there becomes a zombie under the tyrant's command. The dead humanoid retains its place in the initiative order and animates at the start of its next turn, provided that its body hasn't been completely destroyed.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The death tyrant shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:
1. Charm Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the death tyrant for 1 hour, or until the death tyrant harms the creature.

2. Paralyzing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

3. Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

4. Slowing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
5. Enervation Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

6. Telekinetic Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or the death tyrant moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the death tyrant's next turn or until the death tyrant is {@condition incapacitated}.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The death tyrant can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

7. Sleep Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep and remain {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

8. Petrification Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

9. Disintegration Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.
10. Death Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The death tyrant uses one random eye ray.

monster.name: 地底地侏 (斯奈布力)
monster.languages: 地侏語、土族語、地底通用語

trait.name: 岩地偽裝
entries: 地侏在岩石地形為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 地侏狡黠
entries: 地侏在對抗魔法的所有智力、睿知、和魅力豁免中具有優勢。

action.name: 戰鎬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 毒鏢
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程30/120呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 12的體質或免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1分鐘。 目標可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 地侏的天生施法屬性為智力（法術豁免DC 11）。它生來就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4})穿刺傷害。

immune.preNote: 非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A demilich doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep. So great is a demilich's will to survive that it always has the maximum number of hit points for its Hit Dice, instead of average hit points.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The demilich is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: The demilich emits a bloodcurdling howl. Each creature within 30 feet of the demilich that can hear the howl must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: The demilich targets up to three creatures that it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage, and the demilich regains hit points equal to the total damage dealt to all targets.

legendary.name: Flight
entries: The demilich flies up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Cloud of Dust
entries: The demilich magically swirls its dusty remains. Each creature within 10 feet of the demilich, including around a corner, must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the demilich's next turn. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect until the end of the demilich's next turn.

legendary.name: Energy Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature with in 30 feet of the demilich must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's hit point maximum is magically reduced by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). If a creature's hit point maximum is reduced to 0 by this effect, the creature dies. A creature's hit point maximum can be restored with the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

legendary.name: Vile Curse (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The demilich targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically cursed. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the curse on a success.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 4d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The deva 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The deva makes two melee attacks.

action.name: 硬頭錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The deva magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice).

In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The deva's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The deva can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 狼在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若狼有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則狼在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the displacer beast is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The displacer beast projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn. This trait is also disrupted while the displacer beast is {@condition incapacitated} or has a speed of 0.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The displacer beast makes two attacks with its tentacles.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into a warm breeze, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing or carrying.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning or thunder damage (djinni's choice).

action.name: Create Whirlwind
entries: A 5-foot-radius, 30-foot-tall cylinder of swirling air magically forms on a point the djinni can see within 120 feet of it. The whirlwind lasts as long as the djinni maintains concentration (as if concentrating on a spell). Any creature but the djinni that enters the whirlwind must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by it. The djinni can move the whirlwind up to 60 feet as an action, and creatures {@condition restrained} by the whirlwind move with it. The whirlwind ends if the djinni loses sight of it.

A creature can use its action to free a creature {@condition restrained} by the whirlwind, including itself, by succeeding on a DC 18 Strength check. If the check succeeds, the creature is no longer {@condition restrained} and moves to the nearest space outside the whirlwind.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The djinni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

3e: {@spell 創造飲食} (can create wine instead of water)
1e: {@spell 召喚元素生物} (air elemental only)

variant.name: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance or the nature of reality.

Disguises. Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the disguise self spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the true polymorph spell one to three times per day, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.

Wishes. The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (usually 1 year). and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the wish spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's nature, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is usually crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Read Thoughts
entries: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 ft. of wood or dirt, 2 ft. of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) and Charisma ({@skill Deception}, {@skill Intimidation}, and {@skill Persuasion}) checks against the target.

action.name: 蹄擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 龍龜可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 龍龜進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。它也可以用一次尾擊代替二次爪抓攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 20的力量豁免，否則被推離龍龜最多10呎並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: 蒸氣吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 龍龜吐出一道60呎錐形的灼熱蒸氣。每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 18的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到52 ({@damage 15d6})火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。處於水下的生物並不會因此獲得對此傷害的抗性。

monster.name: 怯魔
monster.languages: 深淵語、心靈感應60呎（只對理解深淵語的生物有效）

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 怯魔進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 2d4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 汙臭之雲 (1/日)
entries: 一團10呎半徑的噁心綠色毒氣從怯魔蔓延而出。這團毒氣會繞過轉角，且它所在的區域被輕度遮蔽。它會存在持續1分鐘或直到一陣強風將它吹散。任何在這個區域內開始它回合的生物必須成功通過一次DC 11的體質豁免，否則{@condition 中毒}直到它的下個回合開始。當因為這個方式而{@condition 中毒}，目標在它的回合將只能採取一個動作或一個附贈動作，而不能在同一回合使用兩者，且它將無法採取反應。

trait.name: 精類血統
entries: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: drider可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，drider在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

trait.name: 蛛網行者
entries: The drider 無視蛛網所造成的移動限制。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: 長弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 6}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The drider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). The drider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

variant.name: Drider Spellcasting
entries: Driders that were once drow spellcasters might retain their ability to cast spells. Such driders typically have a higher spellcasting ability (15 or 16) than other driders. Further, the drider gains the Spellcasting trait. A drider that was a drow divine spellcaster, therefore, could have a Wisdom of 16 (+3) and a Spellcasting trait as follows.

Spellcasting. The drider is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The drider has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

items: Cantrips (at will): {@spell 毒氣噴灑}, {@spell 奇術}
1st level (4 slots): {@spell 災禍術}, {@spell 偵測魔法}, {@spell 聖域術}
2nd level (3 slots): {@spell 人類定身術}, {@spell 沉默術}
3rd level (3 slots): {@spell 銳眼術}, {@spell 解除魔法}
4th level (2 slots): {@spell 預言術}, {@spell 行動自如術}

trait.name: 精類血統
entries: 卓爾在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且魔法無法使卓爾入睡。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，卓爾在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: 短劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 手弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1小時。若此豁免檢定的結果與目標值差距5點或更多，則目標在中毒的同時也將陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態。目標將在它受到傷害，或另一個生物使用一個動作將它搖醒時恢復知覺。
卓爾經常穿戴魔法護甲並攜帶魔法武器，但其附魔加值會在暴露於日光照耀下超過1小時後永久消失。
一個{@creature 卓爾}在穿戴{@item 鏈甲衫+1|dmg}並攜帶一把{@item 短劍+1|dmg}時，具有AC 16，並在使用短劍進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+1加值。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 卓爾的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 11）。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

trait.name: 精類血統
entries: 卓爾在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且魔法無法使卓爾入睡。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，卓爾在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 卓爾進行二次短劍攻擊。

action.name: 短劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺傷害加 10 ({@damage 3d6})毒素傷害。

action.name: 手弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 7}，射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1小時。若此豁免檢定的結果與目標值差距5點或更多，則目標在中毒的同時也將陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態。目標將在它受到傷害，或另一個生物使用一個動作將它搖醒時恢復知覺。

reaction.name: 格擋
entries: 卓爾在一次近戰攻擊將要命中它時可以針對該次攻擊使它的AC增加3點。若要這麼做，卓爾必須要能看見攻擊者且正持用一把近戰武器。
卓爾經常穿戴魔法護甲並攜帶魔法武器，但其附魔加值會在暴露於日光照耀下超過1小時後永久消失。
一個{@creature 卓爾菁英戰士}在穿戴{@item 鑲釘皮甲+2|dmg}並攜帶一把{@item 短劍+2|dmg}時，具有AC 20，並在使用短劍進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+2加值。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 卓爾的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 12）。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

trait.name: 精類血統
entries: 卓爾在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且魔法無法使卓爾入睡。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，卓爾在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: 法杖
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1})鈍擊傷害，或若以雙手使用時 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1})鈍擊傷害，加上 3 ({@damage 1d6})毒素傷害。

action.name: 召喚惡魔 (1/日)
entries: 卓爾使用魔法召喚一個{@creature 夸塞魔}，或以{@chance 50|50％|50％召喚機率}的成功率嘗試召喚一個{@creature 影魔}。被召喚的惡魔將出現距離它召喚者60呎內的一處未被佔據空間，做為召喚者的盟友行動，且不能再召喚其它惡魔。它會持續存在長達10分鐘，直到它或它的召喚者死亡、或直到召喚者以一個動作解消它。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 卓爾的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 12）。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 卓爾是10級的施法者。它的施法屬性為智力（法術豁免DC 14，法術攻擊命中{@hit 6}）。卓爾已準備了以下法師法術：

trait.name: 精類血統
entries: 卓爾在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且魔法無法使卓爾入睡。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，卓爾在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 卓爾進行二次鞭打攻擊。

action.name: 鞭打
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害加 17 ({@damage 5d6})毒素傷害。

action.name: 召喚惡魔 (1/日)
entries: 卓爾使用魔法以{@chance 30|30％|30％召喚機率}的成功率嘗試召喚一個{@creature 蠟融妖}。若召喚失敗，則卓爾將受到5 ({@damage 1d10})精神傷害。被召喚的惡魔將出現距離它召喚者60呎內的一處未被佔據空間，做為召喚者的盟友行動，且不能再召喚其它惡魔。它會持續存在長達10分鐘，直到它或它的召喚者死亡、或直到召喚者以一個動作解消它。
卓爾經常穿戴魔法護甲並攜帶魔法武器，但其附魔加值會在暴露於日光照耀下超過1小時後永久消失。
一個{@creature 卓爾．羅絲女祭司}在穿戴{@item 鱗甲+3|dmg}時，具有AC 19。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 卓爾的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 15）。她天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 卓爾是10級的施法者。她的施法屬性為睿知（法術豁免DC 14，法術攻擊命中{@hit 6}）。卓爾已準備了以下牧師法術：

spells: {@spell 召喚動物}（2個{@creature 巨蜘蛛}）

monster.name: 德魯伊
monster.languages: 德魯伊語、和任意兩種語言

action.name: 長棍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}({@spell 橡棍術}時命中{@hit 4})，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})鈍擊傷害，或若以雙手使用時 4 ({@damage 1d8})鈍擊傷害，或若使用橡棍術時 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})鈍擊傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 德魯伊是4級的施法者。它的施法屬性為睿知（法術豁免DC 12，法術攻擊命中{@hit 4}）。它已準備了以下德魯伊法術：

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The dryad 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on her turn, the dryad can use 10 ft. of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be large or bigger.

action.name: 棍棒
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit ({@hit 6} to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

action.name: Fey Charm
entries: The dryad targets one humanoid or beast that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the dryad, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed}. The {@condition charmed} creature regards the dryad as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the dryad's control, it takes the dryad's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can.

Each time the dryad or its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the dryad dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, or ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the dryad's Fey Charm for the next 24 hours.
The dryad can have no more than one humanoid and up to three beasts {@condition charmed} at a time.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The dryad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The dryad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: 灰矮人韌性
entries: 灰矮人在對抗毒素、法術、幻像、以及抵抗{@condition 魅惑}或{@condition 麻痺}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，灰矮人在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: 變巨術（短休或長休之後充能）
entries: 持續1分鐘，灰矮人將用魔法將自己的體型連同任何它正穿戴或攜帶的物體變大。當處於變巨效果時，灰矮人的體型變為大型，它基於力量的武器攻擊的傷害骰變為二倍（已包含在攻擊條目），且在力量檢定和力量豁免中具有優勢。若灰矮人沒有足夠的空間變成大型，則它將會長到該空間可容納的最大尺寸。

action.name: 戰鎬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害，或若處於變巨效果時則造成 11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害，或若處於變巨效果時則造成 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 隱形（短休或長休之後充能）
entries: 灰矮人用魔法使自己{@condition 隱形}，直到它攻擊、施放法術、使用變巨術、或它的專注被打斷（如同專注於法術）。這個效果最多持續1小時。任何灰矮人穿戴或攜帶的裝備都會隨著它隱形。

trait.name: 公理之念
entries: 二元冢無法被強迫去進行違背其天性或指示的行動。

trait.name: 解體
entries: 若二元冢死亡，它的身體將瓦解成塵，留下它的武器和任何它所攜帶的其它東西。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 二元冢進行二次拳擊攻擊或二次標槍攻擊。

action.name: 拳擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害。

variant.name: 遊蕩魔冢
entries: 一個魔冢單元有時候會變得殘缺，無論是因為自然的衰敗、或是因為暴露於混亂力量之下。遊蕩魔冢不會依循奇點的意願或指令行動，它們破壞律法、違背命令、甚至會訴諸於暴力。其他魔冢將會獵殺這類遊盪魔冢。
一個遊蕩魔冢失去公理之念特質，且屬於任何不是守序中立的陣營。除此之外，它們具有和同階級尋常魔冢相同的數據資料。

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A {@condition blinded} creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Blinding Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of blinding dust. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell 睡眠術}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Day)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: 敏銳視覺
entries: 鷹在依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 禽爪
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 土元素
monster.senses: 黑暗視覺60呎, 震顫感知60呎

trait.name: 遁地
entries: 土元素可以移動掘穿非魔法、且未經加工的土層或岩層。當這麼做時，土元素並不會擾動它所移動穿過的物質。

trait.name: 攻城怪物
entries: 土元素對物體和建築物造成兩倍的傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 土元素進行二次猛擊攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the efreeti dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing or carrying.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The efreeti makes two scimitar attacks or uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The efreeti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1e: {@spell 召喚元素生物} (fire elemental only)

variant.name: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance or the nature of reality.

Disguises. Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the disguise self spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the true polymorph spell one to three times per day, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.

Wishes. The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (usually 1 year). and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the wish spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's nature, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is usually crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

trait.name: 踐踏衝鋒
entries: 若象向著一個生物直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次角撞攻擊命中它，則目標必須成功通過一次DC 12的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。若目標{@condition 伏地}，則象能夠以一次附贈動作對它進行一次踩踏攻擊。

action.name: 角撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 踩踏
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一{@condition 伏地}生物。{@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若麋鹿向著一個目標直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次衝撞攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的7 ({@dice 2d6})傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 11的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: 衝撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 蹄擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一{@condition 伏地}生物。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

immune.preNote: 非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: If the empyrean fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The empyrean 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The empyrean's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 17}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}31 ({@damage 6d6 + 10})鈍擊傷害。 If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the empyrean's next turn.

action.name: Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 15} to hit, range 600 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@dice 7d6}) damage of one of the following types (empyrean's choice): acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, radiant, or thunder.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The empyrean makes one attack.

legendary.name: Bolster
entries: The empyrean bolsters all nonhostile creatures within 120 feet of it until the end of its next turn. Bolstered creatures can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and they gain advantage on ability checks and saving throws until the end of the empyrean's next turn.

legendary.name: Trembling Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The empyrean strikes the ground with its maul, triggering an earth tremor. All other creatures on the ground within 60 feet of the empyrean must succeed on a DC 25 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The empyrean's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The erinyes 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The erinyes makes three attacks

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage.

action.name: 長弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 7}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. The poison lasts until it is removed by the {@spell lesser restoration} spell or similar magic.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

variant.name: Rope of Entanglement
entries: Some erinyes carry a rope of entanglement (detailed in the Dungeon Master's Guide). When such an erinyes uses its Multiattack, the erinyes can use the rope in place of two of the attacks.

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: ettercap可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

trait.name: 蛛網感知
entries: 當與蛛網保持接觸時，the ettercap可以知道任何其他與同一張蛛網接觸生物的確切位置。

trait.name: 蛛網行者
entries: The ettercap 無視蛛網所造成的移動限制。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The ettercap makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The creature is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a DC 11 Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, is vulnerable to fire damage and immune to bludgeoning, poison and psychic damage.

variant.name: Web Garrote
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which the ettercap has advantage on the attack roll. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and the ettercap has advantage on attack rolls against it.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The ettin has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The ettin makes two attacks: one with its battleaxe and one with its morningstar.

action.name: 戰斧
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 釘頭錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 七彩年齡
entries: 妖精龍的鱗片會隨其年齡而改變顏色，按照彩虹的七色順序變換。所有的妖精龍都具有天生施法能力，並隨著牠們成長習得新的法術。
紅—5 年或以下
紫—51 年或以上
一隻綠色或更年長的妖精龍的挑戰等級將提升至 2。

trait.name: 強效隱形
entries: 以一個附贈動作，妖精龍可以用魔法使自己{@condition 隱形}直到它的專注被打斷（如同專注於法術）。任何妖精龍穿戴或攜帶的裝備都會隨著它隱形。

trait.name: 有限心靈感應
entries: 藉由心靈感應，妖精龍可以用魔法和其他距離它60呎內的妖精龍進行溝通。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 妖精龍在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}1穿刺傷害。

action.name: 亢奮吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 妖精龍向著距離它5呎內的一個生物吐出一口亢奮毒氣。目標必須成功通過一次DC 11的睿知豁免，否則在1分鐘內，目標無法採取反應，且必須在它的每次回合開始時骰一顆{@dice d6}以決定它在這回合的行為：
1–4：目標不採取動作或附贈動作，並使用它所有的移動速度向一個隨機方向移動。
5–6：目標不移動，且它在這回合唯一能做的事是進行一次DC 11的睿知豁免，若成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 妖精龍的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13）。它天生就可以施展數種法術，且無需任何材料構材：

entries: 妖精龍向著距離它5呎內的一個生物吐出一口亢奮毒氣。目標必須成功通過一次DC 11的睿知豁免，否則在1分鐘內，目標無法採取反應，且必須在它的每次回合開始時骰一顆{@dice d6}以決定它在這回合的行為：
1–4：目標不採取動作或附贈動作，並使用它所有的移動速度向一個隨機方向移動。
5–6：目標不移動，且它在這回合唯一能做的事是進行一次DC 11的睿知豁免，若成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 妖精龍的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13）。它天生就可以施展數種法術，且無需任何材料構材：

trait.name: 七彩年齡
entries: 妖精龍的鱗片會隨其年齡而改變顏色，按照彩虹的七色順序變換。所有的妖精龍都具有天生施法能力，並隨著牠們成長習得新的法術。
紅—5 年或以下
紫—51 年或以上
一隻綠色或更年長的妖精龍的挑戰等級將提升至 2。

trait.name: 強效隱形
entries: 以一個附贈動作，妖精龍可以用魔法使自己{@condition 隱形}直到它的專注被打斷（如同專注於法術）。任何妖精龍穿戴或攜帶的裝備都會隨著它隱形。

trait.name: 有限心靈感應
entries: 藉由心靈感應，妖精龍可以用魔法和其他距離它60呎內的妖精龍進行溝通。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 妖精龍在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}1穿刺傷害。

action.name: 亢奮吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 妖精龍向著距離它5呎內的一個生物吐出一口亢奮毒氣。目標必須成功通過一次DC 11的睿知豁免，否則在1分鐘內，目標無法採取反應，且必須在它的每次回合開始時骰一顆{@dice d6}以決定它在這回合的行為：
1–4：目標不採取動作或附贈動作，並使用它所有的移動速度向一個隨機方向移動。
5–6：目標不移動，且它在這回合唯一能做的事是進行一次DC 11的睿知豁免，若成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 妖精龍在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。
