entries: 藉由心靈感應，妖精龍可以用魔法和其他距離它60呎內的妖精龍進行溝通。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 妖精龍在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}1穿刺傷害。

action.name: 亢奮吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 妖精龍向著距離它5呎內的一個生物吐出一口亢奮毒氣。目標必須成功通過一次DC 11的睿知豁免，否則在1分鐘內，目標無法採取反應，且必須在它的每次回合開始時骰一顆{@dice d6}以決定它在這回合的行為：
1–4：目標不採取動作或附贈動作，並使用它所有的移動速度向一個隨機方向移動。
5–6：目標不移動，且它在這回合唯一能做的事是進行一次DC 11的睿知豁免，若成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 妖精龍的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13）。它天生就可以施展數種法術，且無需任何材料構材：

trait.name: 火焰形體
entries: 火元素可以移動穿越最窄1吋的狹窄空間而不用擠縮身體。一個觸碰火元素或在距離它5呎內時以近戰攻擊命中它的生物將受到5 ({@damage 1d10})火焰傷害。此外，火元素可以進入一個敵對生物所在的空間並在該處停下。當在一個回合中第一次進入一個生物所在的空間時，該生物將受到5 ({@damage 1d10})火焰傷害並被點燃；直到某人採取一個動作撲滅火焰，該生物將在它的每個回合開始時受到5 ({@damage 1d10})火焰傷害。

trait.name: 照明
entries: 火元素會散發出30呎半徑的明亮光照和再延伸30呎的微光光照。

trait.name: 水體敏感
entries: 火元素每在水中移動5呎，或每被噴濺一加侖的水，它就會受到1點寒冰傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 火元素進行二次觸碰攻擊。

action.name: 觸碰
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})火焰傷害。若目標是一個生物或可燃物體，它將被點燃。直到一個生物採取一個動作撲滅火焰，目標將在它的每個回合開始時受到5 ({@damage 1d10})火焰傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 巨人進行二次巨劍攻擊。

action.name: 巨劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 投石
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 11}，射程60/240呎，單一目標。{@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7})鈍擊傷害。

variant.name: 新巨人選項
entries: 有些成年的火巨人受訓於襲擊要塞並突破敵人的防線。這些能力透過下列特性呈現。

entries.name: 攻城怪物
entries: 巨人對物體和建築物造成兩倍的傷害。

entries.name: 衝撞扭倒
entries: 當巨人在一個回合中第一次進入任何敵人所在的空間，該敵人必須成功通過一次DC 19的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15-foot radius, or bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. It can switch between the options as an action.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The flameskull 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a dispel magic or remove curse spell is cast on them.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The flameskull uses Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The flameskull is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. The flameskull has the following wizard spells prepared:

monster.name: 血肉魔像

immune.preNote: 非精金武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: 理解它製造者所掌握的語言，但不會說

trait.name: 狂暴
entries: 每當魔像以40點或更低生命值的情況開始它的回合，骰一顆{@dice d6}。若骰出的結果為6，則魔像將開始狂暴。在它狂暴期間的每個回合，魔像將會攻擊距離它最近且它能看見的生物。如果沒有任何生物位於它移動並攻擊的範圍內，則魔像將會攻擊一個物體，並優先選擇比自己體型更小的物體。一旦魔像開始狂暴，它將會一直持續狂暴直到它被摧毀，或回復它所有的生命值。
若魔像的製造者距離狂暴魔像60呎內，則它可以嘗試藉由堅定且充滿說服力的話語使魔像冷靜。魔像必須要能夠聽見它的製造者，且製造者必須採取一個動作以進行一次DC 15的魅力（{@skill 說服}）檢定。若該檢定成功，魔像將會停止狂暴。若它在擁有40點或更低生命值的情況下受到傷害，則它可能會再次開始狂暴。

trait.name: 厭惡火焰
entries: 當魔像受到火焰傷害，則直到它的下個回合結束前，它將在攻擊檢定和屬性檢定中具有劣勢。

trait.name: 不變形態
entries: 魔像免疫於任何會改變它形態的法術或效果。

trait.name: 閃電吸收
entries: 每當魔像承受閃電傷害時，它並不會受到任何傷害，反而會回復等同於所受到閃電傷害數值的生命值。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 魔像在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 魔法武器
entries: 魔像的武器攻擊視作魔法攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 魔像進行二次猛擊攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

monster.name: 呋嚕
monster.languages: 理解地底通用語但不會說、心靈感應60呎

trait.name: 進階心靈感應
entries: 呋嚕可以感知到任何在它60呎內使用心靈感應交流的內容，且它不會被具有任何心靈感應能力的生物給突襲。

trait.name: 倒地缺陷
entries: 若呋嚕被擊倒{@condition 伏地}，擲一顆骰。若擲骰結果為奇數，呋嚕將上下顛倒著地且陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。在它的每個回合結束時，呋嚕可以進行一次DC 10的敏捷豁免，若豁免成功則將它自己導正並結束{@condition 無力}狀態。

trait.name: 讀心屏障
entries: 呋嚕免疫於任何可以感知它情緒或閱讀它思想的效果，以及所有預言系法術。

action.name: 觸手
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害加 2 ({@damage 1d4})酸蝕傷害。在目標的每個回合結束時，它必須進行一次DC 10的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到2 ({@damage 1d4})酸蝕傷害，豁免成功則結束這個持續的酸蝕傷害。一個施放於目標的{@spell 次級復原術}法術也可以結束這個持續的酸蝕傷害。

action.name: 惡臭噴吐 (1/日)
entries: 每個在以呋嚕為源頭的15呎錐形範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 10的敏捷豁免，否則被惡臭的液體給覆蓋。被覆蓋的生物將散發出可怕的惡臭長達{@dice 1d4}小時。只要這個惡臭仍然持續，該生物處於{@condition 中毒}狀態，且其它生物在距離被覆蓋生物5呎內時也將處於{@condition 中毒}狀態。一個生物可以藉由使用一次短休，用水、酒精、或醋來洗掉它身上的惡臭。

trait.name: 飛掠
entries: 蛇在飛出敵人的觸及範圍時不會觸發藉機攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 穿刺傷害 加上 7 ({@damage 3d4})毒素傷害。

monster.name: 飛行劍
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 反魔法敏感
entries: 當處於{@spell 反魔法結界}的效果範圍時，飛行劍將陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。若它被做為{@spell 解除魔法}的目標，飛行劍必須成功通過一次對抗施法者法術豁免DC的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態持續1分鐘。

trait.name: 擬形
entries: 當飛行劍保持不動，它看起來就跟普通的劍一模一樣。

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The fomorian attacks twice with its greatclub or makes one greatclub attack and uses Evil Eye once.

action.name: 巨棍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Evil Eye
entries: The fomorian magically forces a creature it can see within 60 feet of it to make a DC 14 Charisma saving throw. The creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Curse of the Evil Eye (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: With a stare, the fomorian uses Evil Eye, but on a failed save, the creature is also cursed with magical deformities. While deformed, the creature has its speed halved and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Strength or Dexterity.
The transformed creature can repeat the saving throw whenever it finishes a long rest, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 青蛙可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: 立定跳躍
entries: 青蛙的跳遠距離最多10呎、且跳高距離最多5呎，無論有沒有助跑都一樣。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 巨人進行二次巨斧攻擊。

action.name: 巨斧
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 投石
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 9}，射程60/240呎，單一目標。{@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

variant.name: 新巨人選項
entries: 有些成年的霜巨人是技巧純熟的獵人，它們製作並投擲以金屬片或骨片加重過的捕網。這個能力透過下列動作選項呈現。

entries.name: 加重捕網
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 5}，射程20/60呎，單一體型為小型、中型、或大型的生物。{@h}目標被{@condition 束縛}直到它從捕網中逃脫。任何生物都可以使用它的動作進行一次DC 17的力量檢定，成功則釋放它自己或另一個在捕網內的生物並結束該效果。對捕網（AC12）造成15點劈砍傷害可以將捕網摧毀並釋放目標。

walk.condition: (30 ft. when rolling, 60 ft. rolling downhill)

trait.name: 擬形
entries: While the galeb duhr remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal boulder.

trait.name: Rolling Charge
entries: If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 16的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Animate Boulders (1/Day)
entries: The galeb duhr magically animates up to two boulders it can see within 60 feet of it. A boulder has statistics like those of a galeb duhr, except it has Intelligence 1 and Charisma 1, it can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and it lacks this action option. A boulder remains animated as long as the galeb duhr maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: 擬形
entries: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The gargoyle makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 毒氣孢子
monster.senses: 盲視30呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 死亡自爆
entries: 當毒氣孢子的生命值歸零時，它將會爆炸。每個距離它20呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免檢定，否則受到10 ({@damage 3d6})毒素傷害，並被一種疾病給感染。免疫於{@condition 中毒}狀態的生物將免疫於此疾病效果。
孢子入侵感染生物的體內，且除非此疾病被移除，否則該生物將在經過等同於{@dice 1d12}+該生物體質數值的小時之後被殺死。從這段期間的一半開始，該生物將在剩餘的期間陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態。在該生物死亡後，從它身上將長出{@dice 2d4}個微型的毒氣孢子，並於7天內成長至成熟體型。

trait.name: 怪異擬像
entries: 毒氣孢子看起來與眼魔相當類似。一個看見毒氣孢子的生物可以透過成功通過一次DC 15的智力（自然）檢定以辨識出它真正的本質。

action.name: 觸碰
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 0}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}1 毒素傷害，且該生物必須成功通過一次DC 10的體質豁免，否則將被死亡自爆特性中描述的疾病給感染。

monster.name: 凝膠方塊
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 泥怪方塊
entries: 凝膠方塊佔據它所在位置的整個空間。其他生物可以進入該空間，但這麼做的生物將成為凝膠方塊吞沒能力的目標，且在該豁免檢定中具有劣勢。
在凝膠方塊內的生物可以被看見，但仍視作具有全掩護。
一個距離凝膠方塊5呎內的生物可以採取一個動作以將一個生物或物體從凝膠方塊內拉出。這麼做需要成功通過一次DC 12的力量檢定，且進行此嘗試的生物將受到10 ({@damage 3d6})酸蝕傷害。
凝膠方塊體內同時只能容納一個大型生物、或最多四個體型為中型或更小的生物。

trait.name: 透明
entries: 即使當凝膠方塊處於顯眼的位置，要發現一個未移動且未攻擊的凝膠方塊仍需要成功通過一次DC 15的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定。一個沒察覺凝膠方塊的存在而嘗試進入凝膠方塊所在空間的生物視作被該方塊突襲。

action.name: 偽足
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d6})酸蝕傷害。

action.name: 吞沒
entries: 凝膠方塊移動最多等同它的移動速度。當這麼做時，它可以進入一個體型為大型或更小的生物所在的空間。每當凝膠方塊進入一個生物所在的空間，該生物必須進行一次DC 12的敏捷豁免。
若豁免成功，該生物可以選擇被向後或往凝膠方塊的側面推離5呎。一個選擇不被推離的生物將承受豁免失敗的後果。
若豁免失敗，凝膠方塊將進入該生物所在的空間，且該生物受到10 ({@damage 3d6})酸蝕傷害並被吞沒。被吞沒的生物無法呼吸，被{@condition 束縛}，且在每次凝膠方塊的回合開始時受到21 ({@damage 6d6})酸蝕傷害。當凝膠方塊移動時，被吞沒的生物也將跟著它移動。
一個被吞沒的生物可以藉由採取一個動作以進行一次DC 12的力量檢定來嘗試逃脫。若檢定成功，則該生物逃脫並進入一個距離凝膠方塊5呎內的任一處空間。

trait.name: 惡臭
entries: 任何在妖鬼5呎內開始它回合的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 10的體質豁免，否則直到它的下個回合開始之前陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態。若豁免成功，則該生物將在24小時內免疫這個妖鬼的惡臭。

trait.name: 違抗驅散
entries: 妖鬼和任何距離它30呎的食屍鬼將在對抗驅散不死效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。若目標為一個不死生物以外的生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 10的體質豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態長達1分鐘。目標可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

monster.name: Ghost
monster.languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages {@dice 1d4    ×    10} years. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a  {@spell greater restoration} spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

action.name: Possession {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。若目標為一個不死生物或精靈以外的生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 10的體質豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態長達1分鐘。目標可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 猿進行二次拳擊攻擊。

action.name: 拳擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 投石
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 9}，射程50/100呎，單一目標。{@h}30 ({@damage 7d6 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 獾在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 獾進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 回聲定位
entries: 蝙蝠在{@condition 耳聾}時無法使用牠的盲視。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺
entries: 蝙蝠在依賴聽覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若野豬向著一個目標直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次獠牙攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的7 ({@damage 2d6})劈砍傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 頑強 (短休或長休之後充能)
entries: 若野豬受到10點或更低的傷害而使其生命值歸零，則改為將它的生命值減少至1。

action.name: 獠牙
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 11的體質豁免，否則受到10 ({@damage 3d6})毒素傷害。若此毒素傷害將目標的生命值歸零，則目標的傷勢穩定，但陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1小時，這個狀態即使在目標回復生命值之後仍會持續。且目標若因此而{@condition 中毒}，則將連帶陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 絞纏
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})鈍擊傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 16)。直到擒抱結束前，該生物被{@condition 束縛}，且蟒蛇不能絞纏另一個目標。

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 蟹可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 鉗擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})鈍擊傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 11)。蟹擁有兩隻蟹鉗，各自只能擒抱一個目標。

trait.name: 屏息
entries: 鱷魚可以屏住牠的呼吸長達30分鐘。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 鱷魚進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次尾擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5})穿刺傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 16)。直到擒抱結束前，目標被{@condition 束縛}，且鱷魚不能啃咬另一個目標。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一未{@condition 被擒}於鱷魚的目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 16的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

monster.name: 巨鷹
monster.languages: 巨鷹可以理解通用語和大氣語，但不會說

trait.name: 敏銳視覺
entries: 鷹在依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 鷹進行二次攻擊：一次喙啄，一次禽爪。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 禽爪
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 巨麋鹿
monster.languages: 巨麋鹿理解通用語、精靈語、和木族語，但不會說

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若麋鹿向著一個目標直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次衝撞攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的7 (2d6)傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 14的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: 衝撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 蹄擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一{@condition 伏地}生物。{@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 照明
entries: 甲蟲會散發出10呎半徑的明亮光照和再延伸10呎的微光光照。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 1}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 青蛙可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: 立定跳躍
entries: 青蛙的跳遠距離最多20呎、且跳高距離最多10呎，無論有沒有助跑都一樣。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 11)。直到擒抱結束前，該生物被{@condition 束縛}，且青蛙不能啃咬另一個目標。

action.name: 吞嚥
entries: 青蛙對一個它正擒抱的體型為小型或更小的目標進行一次啃咬攻擊。若該攻擊命中，則目標被吞嚥，且擒抱結束。被吞嚥的目標陷入{@condition 目盲}和{@condition 束縛}，它對青蛙外的攻擊和其他效果有全掩護，且在每次青蛙的回合開始時受到5 ({@damage 2d4})酸蝕傷害。青蛙同時只能讓一個目標被吞嚥。若青蛙死亡，被吞嚥的生物將不再被它{@condition 束縛}，且可以花費5呎的移動速度從屍體中逃脫，以{@condition 伏地}狀態離開。

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若山羊向著一個目標直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次衝撞攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的5 ({@damage 2d4})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 穩妥步伐
entries: 山羊在用於對抗不被擊倒{@condition 伏地}的力量或敏捷豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 衝撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 暴走
entries: 當鬣狗在它的回合以一次近戰攻擊將一個生物的生命值歸零，鬣狗可以使用一個附贈動作以移動最多等同於它移動速度一半的距離，並進行一次啃咬攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

variant.name: 巨蜥蜴特性
entries: 有些巨蜥蜴會擁有以下一個或兩個特性：

entries.name: 屏息
entries: 蜥蜴可以屏住牠的呼吸長達15分鐘。(擁有這個特性的蜥蜴同時擁有30呎的游泳速度。)

entries.name: 蛛行
entries: 蜥蜴可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

trait.name: 屏息
entries: 在離水時，章魚可以屏住牠的呼吸長達1小時。

trait.name: 水下偽裝
entries: 章魚在處於水中時進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 水下呼吸
entries: 章魚只能在水下呼吸。

action.name: 觸手
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 16)。直到擒抱結束前，目標被{@condition 束縛}，且章魚不能對另一個目標使用牠的觸手。

action.name: 墨雲（短休或長休之後充能）
entries: 若章魚在水中，一團20呎半徑的墨汁雲環繞在章魚周遭。這片區域變為重度遮蔽持續1分鐘，但一道水流即可將墨汁吹散。在釋放墨汁後，章魚能夠以一個附贈動作採取疾走動作。

monster.name: 巨貓頭鷹
monster.languages: 巨貓頭鷹理解通用語、精靈語、和木族語，但不會說

trait.name: 飛掠
entries: 貓頭鷹在飛出敵人的觸及範圍時不會觸發藉機攻擊。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和視覺
entries: 貓頭鷹在依賴聽覺和視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 禽爪
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺傷害，且目標必須進行一次DC 11的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到10 ({@damage 3d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 老鼠在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若老鼠有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則老鼠在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 10的體質豁免，否則感染一種疾病。直到該疾病被治癒，目標無法透過魔法以外的手段回復生命值，且每經過24小時目標的生命值最大值將減少3 ({@dice 1d6})點。若目標的生命值最大值因為這個疾病而歸零，則目標死亡。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 蠍子進行三次攻擊：二次鉗擊，一次螫刺。

action.name: 鉗擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})鈍擊傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 12)。蠍子擁有兩隻蠍鉗，各自只能擒抱一個目標。

action.name: 螫刺
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害，且目標必須進行一次DC 12的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到22 ({@damage 4d10})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若海馬向著一個目標直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次衝撞攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的7 ({@damage 2d6})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 11的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 水下呼吸
entries: 海馬只能在水下呼吸。

action.name: 衝撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 鮮血狂熱
entries: 鯊魚在對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 水下呼吸
entries: 鯊魚只能在水下呼吸。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 巨蜘蛛
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: 蜘蛛可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

trait.name: 蛛網感知
entries: 當與蛛網保持接觸時，蜘蛛可以知道任何其他與同一張蛛網接觸生物的確切位置。

trait.name: 蛛網行者
entries: 蜘蛛無視蛛網所造成的移動限制。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺傷害，且目標必須進行一次DC 11的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到9 ({@damage 2d8})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。若此毒素傷害將目標的生命值歸零，則目標的傷勢穩定，但陷入 {@condition 中毒}狀態長達1小時，這個狀態即使在目標回復生命值之後仍會持續。且目標若因此而{@condition 中毒}，則將連帶陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態。

action.name: 蛛網{@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 5}，射程30/60呎，單一生物。{@h}目標被蛛網給{@condition 束縛}。以一個動作，被{@condition 束縛}的目標可以進行一次DC 12的力量檢定，若檢定成功則掙脫蛛網。蛛網可以被攻擊且被破壞（AC 10; 5點生命值; 對火焰傷害易傷; 免疫鈍擊、毒素、和精神傷害）。

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 蟾蜍可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: 立定跳躍
entries: 蟾蜍的跳遠距離最多20呎、且跳高距離最多10呎，無論有沒有助跑都一樣。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害加 5 ({@damage 1d10})毒素傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 13)。直到擒抱結束前，目標被{@condition 束縛}，且蟾蜍不能啃咬另一個目標。

action.name: 吞嚥
entries: 蟾蜍對一個它正擒抱的體型為中型或更小的目標進行一次啃咬攻擊。若該攻擊命中，則目標被吞嚥，且擒抱結束。被吞嚥的目標陷入{@condition 目盲}和{@condition 束縛}，它對蟾蜍外的攻擊和其他效果有全掩護，且在每次蟾蜍的回合開始時受到10 ({@damage 3d6})酸蝕傷害。蟾蜍同時只能讓一個目標被吞嚥。
若蟾蜍死亡，被吞嚥的生物將不再被它{@condition 束縛}，且可以花費5呎的移動速度從屍體中逃脫，以{@condition 伏地}狀態離開。

trait.name: 敏銳視覺和嗅覺
entries: 禿鷲在依賴視覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若禿鷲有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則禿鷲在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 禿鷲進行二次攻擊：一次喙啄，一次禽爪。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 禽爪
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 螫刺
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害，且目標必須進行一次DC 11的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到10 ({@damage 3d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。若此毒素傷害將目標的生命值歸零，則目標的傷勢穩定，但陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1小時，這個狀態即使在目標回復生命值之後仍會持續。且目標若因此而{@condition 中毒}，則將連帶陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 鼬鼠在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Aberrant Ground
entries: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Gibbering
entries: The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't {@condition incapacitated}. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The gibbering mouther makes one bite attack and, if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}17 ({@damage 5d6})穿刺傷害。 If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.

action.name: Blinding Spittle {@recharge 5}
entries: The mouther spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 15 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the mouther's next turn.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 吉斯洋基人進行二次銀質巨劍攻擊。

action.name: 銀質巨劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})劈砍傷害加 10 ({@damage 3d6})精神傷害。此攻擊視為魔法武器攻擊。當命中處於星界軀體（如同使用{@spell 星界投射}法術）的目標的攻擊發生暴擊，吉斯洋基人可以砍斷聯繫著目標與它物質軀體的銀色繫線，而非造成傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法（靈能）
headerEntries: 吉斯洋基人的天生施法屬性為智力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何構材：
will: {@spell 法師之手}（這隻手為隱形狀態）

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 吉斯洋基人進行二次巨劍攻擊。

action.name: 巨劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})劈砍傷害加 7 ({@damage 2d6})精神傷害。

will: {@spell 法師之手}（這隻手為隱形狀態）

trait.name: 靈能防護
entries: 當吉斯澤萊人未穿戴任何護甲且未持用盾牌時，它的AC將加上它的睿知調整值。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 吉斯澤萊人進行二次徒手打擊。

action.name: 徒手打擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})鈍擊傷害加 9 ({@damage 2d8})精神傷害。此攻擊視為魔法武器攻擊。

headerEntries: 吉斯澤萊人的天生施法屬性為睿知。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何構材：
will: {@spell 法師之手}（這隻手為隱形狀態）

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 迷誘魔在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 迷誘魔進行四次攻擊：二次鉗擊和二次拳擊。或者，它可以進行二次鉗擊並施放一個法術。

action.name: 鉗擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個體型為中型或更小的生物，則它將{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 15)。迷誘魔擁有兩隻鉗爪，各自只能擒抱一個目標。

action.name: 拳擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})鈍擊傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 迷誘魔的天生施法屬性為智力（法術豁免DC 16）。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

variant.name: 召喚惡魔 (1/日)
entries: 該惡魔選擇要召喚什麼，並嘗試進行一次魔法召喚。
一個迷誘魔有{@chance 30|30％|30％召喚機率}機率召喚出{@dice 1d3}個{@creature 弗洛魔}、{@dice 1d2}個{@creature 狂戰魔}、或一個迷誘魔。
被召喚的惡魔將出現距離它召喚者60呎內的一處未被佔據空間，做為召喚者的盟友行動，且不能再召喚其它惡魔。它會持續存在長達1分鐘，直到它或它的召喚者死亡、或直到召喚者以一個動作解消它。

monster.name: 角鬥士
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

trait.name: 勇氣
entries: 角鬥士在對抗{@condition 恐懼}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 殘暴
entries: 一把近戰武器會在角鬥士用它命中目標時造成一顆額外的傷害骰（已包含在攻擊條目）。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 角鬥士進行三次近戰攻擊或二次遠程攻擊。

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 盾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})鈍擊傷害。若目標是一個體型為中型或更小的生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 15的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

reaction.name: 格擋
entries: 角鬥士在一次近戰攻擊將要命中它時可以針對該次攻擊使它的AC增加3點。若要這麼做，角鬥士必須要能看見攻擊者且正持用一把近戰武器。

trait.name: 暴走
entries: 當豺狼人在它的回合以一次近戰攻擊將一個生物的生命值歸零，豺狼人可以使用一個附贈動作以移動最多等同於它移動速度一半的距離，並進行一次啃咬攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 長弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 暴走
entries: 當豺狼人在它的回合以一次近戰攻擊將一個生物的生命值歸零，豺狼人可以使用一個附贈動作以移動最多等同於它移動速度一半的距離，並進行一次啃咬攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 豺狼人進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 12的體質豁免，否則受到 7 ({@damage 2d6})毒素傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 暴走
entries: 當豺狼人在它的回合以一次近戰攻擊將一個生物的生命值歸零，豺狼人可以使用一個附贈動作以移動最多等同於它移動速度一半的距離，並進行一次啃咬攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 豺狼人進行二次攻擊，使用長柄刀或長弓，且若可以的話則再使用它的煽動暴走。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 長柄刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 長弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 煽動暴走 {@recharge 5}
entries: 若一個距離豺狼人30呎內，且豺狼人所能看見的一個具有暴走特質的生物能夠聽見豺狼人的聲音，則它可以使用它的反應以進行一次近戰攻擊。

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若山羊向著一個目標直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次衝撞攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的2 ({@damage 1d4})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 10的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 穩妥步伐
entries: 山羊在用於對抗不被擊倒{@condition 伏地}的力量或敏捷豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 衝撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 靈敏脫逃
entries: 哥布林可以在每次它的回合以一個附贈動作來採取{@action 撤離}或{@action 躲藏}動作。

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 短弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程80/320呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 靈敏脫逃
entries: 哥布林可以在每次它的回合以一個附贈動作來採取{@action 撤離}或{@action 躲藏}動作。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 哥布林進行二次彎刀攻擊。第二次攻擊具有劣勢。

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})穿刺傷害。

reaction.name: 攻擊轉向
entries: 當一個哥布林所能看見的生物以它作為一次攻擊的目標，哥布林可以選擇距離它5呎內的另一個哥布林。這兩個哥布林將交換位置，且所選的哥布林將代替成為該次攻擊的目標。

monster.name: 金龍幼龍
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 金龍可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 吐息武器 {@recharge 5}
entries: 金龍使用以下其中一種吐息武器。

items.name: 火焰吐息：
items.entry: 金龍吐出一道15呎錐形的烈焰。每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 13的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到22 ({@damage 4d10})火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

items.name: 弱化吐息：
items.entry: 金龍吐出一道15呎錐形的毒氣。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則在基於力量的攻擊檢定、力量檢定、和力量豁免中承受劣勢長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

trait.name: 踐踏衝鋒
entries: 若gorgon向著一個生物直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次gore攻擊命中它，則目標必須成功通過一次DC 16的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。若目標{@condition 伏地}，則gorgon能夠以一次附贈動作對它進行一次hooves攻擊。

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Petrifying Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若巨牛魔向著一個目標直線移動至少15呎並接著在同回合以一次角撞攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的38 ({@damage 7d10})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 21的力量豁免，否則被推離最多20呎並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 迷宮追憶
entries: 巨牛魔可以完美地回想起任何它走過的道路。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 巨牛魔在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 攻城怪物
entries: 巨牛魔對物體和建築物造成兩倍的傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 巨牛魔進行三次攻擊：兩次拳擊，一次蹄擊。

action.name: 拳擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 蹄擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 21的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: 角撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}45 ({@damage 7d10 + 7})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 灰泥怪
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 無定形
entries: 泥怪可以移動穿越最窄1吋的狹窄空間而不用擠縮身體。

trait.name: 腐蝕金屬
entries: 任何金屬製成的非魔法武器將在命中泥怪時被腐蝕。在造成傷害之後，該武器的傷害骰將受到一個永久且可累積的−1罰值。若該罰值累積至−5，則該武器被摧毀。金屬製成的非魔法彈藥會在命中泥怪時並造成傷害後被摧毀。
泥怪可以在1輪內吃掉2吋厚、非魔法的金屬。

trait.name: 擬形
entries: 當泥怪保持不動，它看起來就跟油滑水塘或潮濕岩石一模一樣。

action.name: 偽足
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})鈍擊傷害加 7 ({@damage 2d6})酸蝕傷害，且若目標正穿著非魔法金屬護甲，則它的護甲將被部分腐蝕且其所提供的AC將受到永久且可累積的−1罰值。若護甲的AC被此罰值減至10，則該護甲被摧毀。

monster.name: 灰泥怪(靈能)
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 無定形
entries: 泥怪可以移動穿越最窄1吋的狹窄空間而不用擠縮身體。

trait.name: 腐蝕金屬
entries: 任何金屬製成的非魔法武器將在命中泥怪時被腐蝕。在造成傷害之後，該武器的傷害骰將受到一個永久且可累積的−1罰值。若該罰值累積至−5，則該武器被摧毀。金屬製成的非魔法彈藥會在命中泥怪時並造成傷害後被摧毀。
泥怪可以在1輪內吃掉2吋厚、非魔法的金屬。

trait.name: 擬形
entries: 當泥怪保持不動，它看起來就跟油滑水塘或潮濕岩石一模一樣。

action.name: 偽足
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})鈍擊傷害加 7 ({@damage 2d6})酸蝕傷害，且若目標正穿著非魔法金屬護甲，則它的護甲將被部分腐蝕且其所提供的AC將受到永久且可累積的−1罰值。若護甲的AC被此罰值減至10，則該護甲被摧毀。

action.name: 精神粉碎{@recharge 5}
entries: 泥怪以距離它60呎內一個它可以感知到的生物為目標。目標必須進行一次DC 10的智力豁免，若豁免失敗則受到10 ({@damage 3d6})精神傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

monster.name: Gray Slaad
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The slaad 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The slaad's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or greatsword.

action.name: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Claws (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 巨劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition charmed} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell imprisonment}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell wish} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell 高等復原術} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitated} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage to the slaad.

monster.name: 綠龍幼龍
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 綠龍可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害加 3 ({@damage 1d6})毒素傷害。

action.name: 劇毒吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 綠龍吐出一道15呎錐形的劇毒氣體。每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 11的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到21 ({@damage 6d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intelligence modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intelligence modifier.

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: The hag可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

trait.name: Hag Coven
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

trait.name: Hag Eye (Coven Only)
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} psychic damage and is {@condition blinded} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition blinded}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.name: Invisible Passage
entries: The hag magically turns {@condition invisible} until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While {@condition invisible}, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is invisible with her.

monster.name: Green Slaad
monster.senses: 盲視30呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The slaad 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or staff. Alternatively, it uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Claw (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 法杖
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. The fire ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition charmed} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell imprisonment}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell wish} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell 高等復原術} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitated} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage to the slaad.

monster.name: Grell
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The grell makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its beak.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition paralyzed}, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

The target is also {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). If the target is Medium or smaller, it is also {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. While grappling the target, the grell has advantage on attack rolls against it and can 't use this attack against other targets. When the grell moves, any Medium or smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 岩地偽裝
entries: 穴居攫怪在岩石地形為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 穴居攫怪進行一次觸手攻擊。若該攻擊命中，則穴居攫怪可以再對同個目標進行一次喙啄攻擊。

action.name: 觸手
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 岩地偽裝
entries: 穴居攫怪在岩石地形為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 穴居攫怪進行二次：一次尾擊，一次觸手。若它的觸手攻擊命中，則穴居攫怪可以再對同個目標進行一次喙啄攻擊。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 觸手
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳視覺
entries: 獅鷲在依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 獅鷲進行二次攻擊：一次喙啄，一次爪抓。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 石盲蠻族
monster.senses: 盲視30呎 或耳聾時盲視10呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 盲感
entries: 石盲蠻族在它{@condition 耳聾}且無法使用嗅覺時，不能使用它的盲視感官。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 石盲蠻族在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 岩地偽裝
entries: 石盲蠻族在岩石地形為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 刺骨棍棒
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})鈍擊傷害加 2 ({@damage 1d4})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 衛兵
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Spit Poison
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. {@h}The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})劈砍傷害。

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sphinx is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: 戰斧
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})劈砍傷害，或若以雙手使用則造成 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 半紅龍老兵
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 老兵進行二次長劍攻擊。若它已經抽出一把短劍，則它可以再進行一次短劍攻擊。

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})劈砍傷害，或若以雙手使用時 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 短劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 重弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程100/400呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 火焰吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 老兵吐出一道15呎錐形的烈焰。每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到24 ({@damage 7d6})火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The harpy makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its club.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 棍棒
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is {@condition incapacitated}.

While {@condition charmed} by the harpy, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 ft. away from the harpy, the target must move on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.
A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: 敏銳視覺
entries: 獵鷹在依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 禽爪
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 劈砍傷害。

monster.name: Hell Hound
monster.languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: The hound 在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若hound有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則hound在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: 恐怖鎧甲

resist.preNote: 非精金武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）
monster.languages: 理解它製造者所掌握的語言，但不會說

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 恐怖鎧甲在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 法術免疫
entries: 恐怖鎧甲免疫於三種由它製造者所選擇的法術。這個法術免疫的選擇通常會包括{@spell 火球術}、{@spell 灼熱金屬}、和{@spell 閃電束}。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 恐怖鎧甲進行二次長劍攻擊。

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})劈砍傷害，或若以雙手使用則造成 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 狂戰魔在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 惡臭
entries: 任何在距離狂戰魔10呎內開始它回合的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 14的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態直到它的下個回合開始。若此豁免成功，該生物將免疫於該狂戰魔的惡臭長達24小時。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 狂戰魔進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。

variant.name: 召喚惡魔 (1/日)
entries: 該惡魔選擇要召喚什麼，並嘗試進行一次魔法召喚。
一個狂戰魔有{@chance 30|30％|30％召喚機率}機率召喚出{@dice 2d6}個{@creature 怯魔}或一個狂戰魔。
被召喚的惡魔將出現距離它召喚者60呎內的一處未被佔據空間，做為召喚者的盟友行動，且不能再召喚其它惡魔。它會持續存在長達1分鐘，直到它或它的召喚者死亡、或直到召喚者以一個動作解消它。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 巨人進行二次巨棍攻擊。

action.name: 巨棍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 投石
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 8}，射程60/240呎，單一目標。{@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5})鈍擊傷害。

variant.name: 新巨人選項
entries: 有些成年的山丘巨人喜歡把自己的身體扔向體型較小的敵人，並把敵人壓垮在它們的身體下。這個能力透過下列動作選項呈現。

entries.name: 輾壓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一體型為中型或更小的生物。{@h}26 ({@damage 6d6 + 5})鈍擊傷害，巨人在目標的空間內以{@condition prone}狀態著地，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 15)。直到擒抱結束前，目標處於{@condition 伏地}。這個擒抱會在山丘巨人起身時提早結束。

trait.name: 敏銳視覺
entries: The hippogriff在依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The hippogriff makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 成軍優勢
entries: 每回合一次，當大哥布林在以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，若大哥布林有一個隊友距離該生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則大哥布林可以對它造成額外的7 ({@dice 2d6})傷害。

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})劈砍傷害，或若以雙手使用則造成 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 長弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 成軍優勢
entries: 每回合一次，當大哥布林在以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，若大哥布林有一個隊友距離該生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則大哥布林可以對它造成額外的10 ({@dice 3d6})傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 大哥布林進行二次巨劍攻擊。

action.name: 巨劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 領導力（短休或長休之後充能）
entries: 在1分鐘內，每當一個距離大哥布林30呎內，且大哥布林可以看見的非敵意生物進行一次攻擊檢定或豁免檢定，大哥布林可以說出一句特殊指令或警告。只要該生物可以聽見並理解大哥布林，則它可以骰一顆{@dice d4}並加入它的擲骰結果中。一個生物同時只能得益於一顆領導力骰。這個效果會在大哥布林陷入{@condition 無力}狀態時結束。

trait.name: 成軍優勢
entries: 每回合一次，當大哥布林在以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，若大哥布林有一個隊友距離該生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則大哥布林可以對它造成額外的14 ({@dice 4d6})傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 大哥布林進行三次近戰攻擊。或者，它可以使用標槍進行二次遠程攻擊。

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})劈砍傷害，或若以雙手使用則造成 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 盾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})鈍擊傷害。若目標是一個體型為大型或更小的生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 14的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 領導力（短休或長休之後充能）
entries: 在1分鐘內，每當一個距離大哥布林30呎內，且大哥布林可以看見的非敵意生物進行一次攻擊檢定或豁免檢定，大哥布林可以說出一句特殊指令或警告。只要該生物可以聽見並理解大哥布林，則它可以骰一顆{@dice d4}並加入它的擲骰結果中。一個生物同時只能得益於一顆領導力骰。這個效果會在大哥布林陷入{@condition 無力}狀態時結束。

reaction.name: 格擋
entries: 大哥布林在一次近戰攻擊將要命中它時可以針對該次攻擊使它的AC增加3點。若要這麼做，大哥布林必須要能看見攻擊者且正持用一把近戰武器。

monster.name: 荷蒙庫魯斯
monster.languages: 理解它創造者的語言，但不會說

trait.name: 心靈連結
entries: 當荷蒙庫魯斯和它的主人處於相同的存在位面，它可以用魔法將它所察覺的事物傳達給它的主人，且雙方可以透過心靈感應溝通。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}1 穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 10的體質豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1分鐘。若此豁免檢定的結果與目標值差距5點或更多，則目標將改為陷入{@condition 中毒}長達 5 ({@dice 1d10})分鐘，且在{@condition 中毒}狀態的持續期間陷入{@condition 昏迷}。

monster.name: Hook Horror
monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 回聲定位
entries: The hook horror在{@condition 耳聾}時無法使用牠的盲視。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺
entries: The hook horror 在依賴聽覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The hook horror makes two hook attacks.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙devil的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The devil 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The devil makes three melee attacks: two with its fork and one with its tail. It can use Hurl Flame in place of any melee attack.

action.name: Fork
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6})穿刺傷害。 If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or lose 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

trait.name: 鮮血狂熱
entries: 鯊魚在對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 水下呼吸
entries: 鯊魚只能在水下呼吸。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 屏息
entries: The hydra可以屏住牠的呼吸長達1小時。

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the hydra takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若鬣狗有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則鬣狗在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: Ice Devil

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙devil的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The devil 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The devil makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Wall of Ice {@recharge}
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is {@condition incapacitated}. The creature then makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is {@condition incapacitated} or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

monster.name: Ice Devil Spear

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

monster.senses: 盲視60呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙devil的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The devil 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

action.name: Ice Spear
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, or for 1 minute, its speed is reduced by 10 feet; it can take either an action or a bonus action on each of its turns, not both; and it can't take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Wall of Ice
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is {@condition incapacitated}. The creature then makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is {@condition incapacitated} or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: 擬形
entries: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) cold damage.

action.name: Frost Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of cold air. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell 雲霧術}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Day)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

resist.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: 變形者
entries: 小魔鬼可以使用它的動作以變形成類似於一隻老鼠（速度20呎）、一隻渡鴉（20呎, 飛行60呎）、或一隻蜘蛛（20呎, 攀爬20呎）的野獸型態，或者變回它的真實型態。除了註記的速度之外，它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備不會隨著變形發生轉變。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙小魔鬼的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 小魔鬼在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 釘刺（野獸型態則為啃咬）
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害，且目標必須進行一次DC 11的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到10 ({@damage 3d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

action.name: 隱形
entries: 小魔鬼用魔法使自己{@condition 隱形}，直到它攻擊、或它的專注被打斷（如同專注於法術）。任何小魔鬼穿戴或攜帶的裝備都會隨著它隱形。

variant.name: 小魔鬼魔寵
entries: 小魔鬼時常會擔任凡人施法者的僕役，擔任顧問、密探、或是魔寵等角色。一個小魔鬼會敦促它的主人施行邪惡的行為，以期它能在最終將這個凡人的靈魂做為獎勵據為己有。小魔鬼會對它的主人展現出非同尋常的忠誠，且在它主人受到威脅時變的相當危險。某些這類的小魔鬼具有以下特質。

entries.name: 魔寵
entries: 小魔鬼可以簽下契約以做為魔寵服侍另一個生物，與它的主人建立一道心靈連結。當雙方連結時，只要他們距離彼此1哩之內，主人就可以感知小魔鬼所感知的事物。當小魔鬼距離它主人10呎內，其主人將能享有小魔鬼的魔法抗性特質。若它的主人違背契約內容時，小魔鬼可以結束它做為魔寵的服務，並終止這道心靈連結。

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has {@condition charmed}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only one target {@condition charmed} at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature {@condition charmed} by it or a willing creature. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

monster.name: Intellect Devourer
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）
monster.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak, telepathy 60 ft.

trait.name: Detect Sentience
entries: The intellect devourer can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The intellect devourer makes one attack with its claws and uses Devour Intellect.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Devour Intellect
entries: The intellect devourer targets one creature it can see within 10 feet of it that has a brain. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw against this magic or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage. Also on a failure, roll {@dice 3d6}: If the total equals or exceeds the target's Intelligence score, that score is reduced to 0. The target is {@condition stunned} until it regains at least one point of Intelligence.

action.name: Body Thief
entries: The intellect devourer initiates an Intelligence contest with an {@condition incapacitated} humanoid within 5 feet of it that isn't protected by {@spell protection from evil and good}. If it wins the contest, the intellect devourer magically consumes the target's brain, teleports into the target's skull, and takes control of the target's body. While inside a creature, the intellect devourer has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The intellect devourer retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as its understanding of Deep Speech, its telepathy, and its traits. It otherwise adopts the target's statistics. It knows everything the creature knew, including spells and languages.

If the host body dies, the intellect devourer must leave it. A {@spell protection from evil and good} spell cast on the body drives the intellect devourer out. The intellect devourer is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a wish. By spending 5 feet of its movement, the intellect devourer can voluntarily leave the body, teleporting to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The body then dies, unless its brain is restored within 1 round.

monster.name: Invisible Stalker
monster.languages: Auran, understands Common but doesn't speak it

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: The stalker is {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The stalker makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

monster.name: 鋼鐵魔像

immune.preNote: 非精金武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: 理解它製造者所掌握的語言，但不會說

trait.name: 火焰吸收
entries: 每當魔像承受火焰傷害時，它並不會受到任何傷害，反而會回復等同於所受到火焰傷害數值的生命值。

trait.name: 不變形態
entries: 魔像免疫於任何會改變它形態的法術或效果。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The golem 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 魔法武器
entries: 魔像的武器攻擊視作魔法攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 魔像進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 劍劈
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 劇毒吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 魔像吐出一道15呎錐形的劇毒氣體。每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 19的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到45 ({@damage 10d8})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 豺狼在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若豺狼有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則豺狼在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 1}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 化豺

immune.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: 通用語 (不能在豺狼型態下說話)

trait.name: 變形者
entries: 化豺可以使用它的動作以變形成一個體型為中型的特定人類或一個半豺狼類人，或變回它的真實型態（一隻小型的豺狼）。除了它的體型之外，它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備並不會隨著變形發生轉變。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 化豺在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若化豺有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則化豺在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬 (限定豺狼或半豺狼人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 彎刀 (限定人類或半豺狼人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 催眠凝視
entries: 化豺凝視一個距離它30呎內且它所能看見的生物。目標必須進行一次DC 10的睿知豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將屈服於魔法睡眠中，並陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態長達10分鐘，或直到有人使用它的動作把目標搖醒。一個成功通過此豁免檢定的生物將在接下來的24小時內免疫於該化豺的催眠凝視。不死生物和免疫於{@condition 魅惑}的生物不會受到這個效果的影響。

monster.name: 天狗
monster.languages: 理解氣族語和通用語，但只能透過它的擬聲特性來說話

trait.name: 伏擊者
entries: 在戰鬥的第一輪中，天狗對任何被它突襲的生物所進行的攻擊檢定具有優勢。

trait.name: 擬聲
entries: 天狗可以模仿任何它曾聽過的聲音，包括人的嗓音。一個聽到這類聲音的生物可以透過成功通過一次DC 14的睿知（{@skill 察言觀色}）檢定以辨別出該聲音是被模仿發出的。

action.name: 短劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 短弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 5}，射程80/320呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 回聲定位
entries: 虎鯨在{@condition 耳聾}時無法使用牠的盲視。

trait.name: 屏息
entries: 虎鯨可以屏住牠的呼吸長達30分鐘。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺
entries: 虎鯨在依賴聽覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 騎士
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

trait.name: 勇氣
entries: 騎士在對抗{@condition 恐懼}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 騎士進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 巨劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 重弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 2}，射程100/400呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d10})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 領導力（短休或長休之後充能）
entries: 在1分鐘內，每當一個距離騎士30呎內，且騎士可以看見的非敵意生物進行一次攻擊檢定或豁免檢定，騎士可以說出一句特殊指令或警告。只要該生物可以聽見並理解騎士，則它可以骰一顆{@dice d4}並加入它的擲骰結果中。一個生物同時只能得益於一顆領導力骰。這個效果會在騎士陷入{@condition 無力}狀態時結束。

reaction.name: 格擋
entries: 騎士在一次近戰攻擊將要命中它時可以針對該次攻擊使它的AC增加2點。若要這麼做，騎士必須要能看見攻擊者且正持用一把近戰武器。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，狗頭人在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若狗頭人有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則狗頭人在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 投石索
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})鈍擊傷害。

monster.name: Kraken

immune.preNote: 非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: understands Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, and Primordial but can't speak, telepathy 120 ft.

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: The kraken可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: 攻城怪物
entries: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 17}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10})穿刺傷害。 If the target is a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. If the kraken takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 17}，觸及30呎，單一目標。{@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Storm
entries: The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kraken uses Lightning Storm.

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 寇濤魚人可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: 異界感知
entries: 寇濤魚人可以感知到任何距離它30呎內處於{@condition 隱形}狀態或在乙太位面的生物。它可以準確知道這類生物在移動時的確切位置。

trait.name: 滑溜
entries: 寇濤魚人在為逃離擒抱所進行的屬性檢定和豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，寇濤魚人在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 捕網
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程5/15呎，單一體型為大型或更小的生物。{@h}目標將被{@condition 束縛}。一個生物可以使用它的動作進行一次DC 10的力量檢定，成功則釋放它自己或另一個在捕網內的生物。對捕網（AC10）造成5點劈砍傷害可以將捕網摧毀，釋放目標而不會傷害到它。

reaction.name: 黏性盾牌
entries: 當一個生物在對寇濤魚人所進行的近戰武器攻擊失手時，寇濤魚人可以使用它的黏性盾牌以捕獲該武器。攻擊者必須成功通過一次DC 11的力量豁免，否則該武器將黏在寇濤魚人的盾牌上。若該武器的持用者無法或不願放開該武器，則持用者將在武器被黏住的期間視作{@condition 被擒}。當武器被黏住時，該武器將無法被使用。一個生物可以藉由進行一次DC 11的力量檢定並成功以將該武器從盾牌上拉開。

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 寇濤魚人可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

trait.name: 異界感知
entries: 寇濤魚人可以感知到任何距離它30呎內處於{@condition 隱形}狀態或在乙太位面的生物。它可以準確知道這類生物在移動時的確切位置。

entries: 寇濤魚人進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 祭祀權杖
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害加 14 ({@damage 4d6})閃電傷害。

action.name: 徒手打擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

entries: 寇濤魚人將它的睿知調整值加入它的護甲等級中。

action.name: 鉗杖
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個體型為中型或更小的生物，則它將{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 14)。直到擒抱結束前，寇濤魚人不能對另一個目標使用它的鉗杖。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 寇濤魚人是2級的施法者。它的施法屬性為睿知（法術豁免DC 12，法術攻擊命中{@hit 4}）。寇濤魚人已準備了以下牧師法術：

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The lamia makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its dagger or Intoxicating Touch.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Intoxicating Touch
entries: {@atk ms} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}The target is magically cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and all ability checks.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The lamia's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙劣魔的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 地獄回生
entries: 除非被施有{@spell 祝福術}法術的善良陣營角色殺死，或它的遺骸被聖水澆灑，否則一個在九層地獄中死亡的劣魔將會於{@dice 1d10}天後以生命值全滿的狀態復活。

action.name: 拳擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4})鈍擊傷害。

monster.name: 巫妖
Lich

immune.preNote: 非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: Common plus up to five other languages

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} 命中{@hit 12}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The lich casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 獅子在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若獅子有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則獅子在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 猛撲
entries: 若獅子向著一個生物直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次爪抓攻擊命中它，則目標必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。若目標{@condition 伏地}，則獅子能夠以一次附贈動作對它進行一次啃咬攻擊。

trait.name: 助跑跳躍
entries: 在10呎助跑後，獅子可以跳遠最多25呎距離。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 0}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 屏息
entries: 蜥蜴人可以屏住它的呼吸長達15分鐘。

trait.name: 串刺
entries: 每回合一次，當蜥蜴人使用它的三叉戟進行一次近戰攻擊並命中，目標將受到額外的10 ({@dice 3d6})傷害，且蜥蜴人將獲得等同於造成額外傷害數值的臨時生命值。

entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害，或若處於鱷魚型態則造成 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害。若蜥蜴人處於鱷魚型態，且目標的體型為大型或更小，則目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 12)。直到擒抱結束前，目標被{@condition 束縛}，且蜥蜴人不能啃咬另一個目標。若蜥蜴人回復其真實型態，則擒抱結束。

action.name: 爪抓 (限定蜥蜴人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 改變型態（短休或長休之後充能）
entries: 蜥蜴人用魔法變形成一隻鱷魚，並維持該型態持續最多1小時。它能夠以一個附贈動作變回它的真實型態。除了體型之外，它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備不會隨著變形發生轉變。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。

spellcasting.name: 施法 (限定蜥蜴人型態)
headerEntries: 蜥蜴人薩滿是5級的施法者。它的施法屬性為睿知（法術豁免DC 12，法術攻擊命中{@hit 4}）。蜥蜴人薩滿已準備了以下德魯伊法術：

entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。
