entries: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until magic such as the {@spell lesser restoration} spell removes the blindness.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The solar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 25). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 1}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The spectator shoots up to two of the following magical eye rays at one or two creatures it can see within 90 feet of it. It can use each ray only once on a turn.

1. Confusion Ray. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw, or it can't take reactions until the end of its next turn. On its turn, the target can't move, and it uses its action to make a melee or ranged attack against a randomly determined creature within range. If the target can't attack, it does nothing on its turn.

2. Paralyzing Ray. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

3. Fear Ray. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the spectator is visible to the target, ending the effect on itself on a success.
4. Wounding Ray. The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Create Food and Water
entries: The spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the spectator makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the spectator can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the spectator. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

monster.name: 幽靈
monster.languages: 理解所有它生前掌握的語言，但不會說

trait.name: 虛體移動
entries: 幽靈可以把其它生物和物體視作困難地形移動穿過它們。若它在一個物體內結束它的回合，則它將受到5 ({@damage 1d10})力場傷害。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，幽靈在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: 生命吸取
entries: {@atk ms} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d6})死靈傷害。目標必須成功通過一次DC 10的體質豁免，否則它的生命值最大值將減少等同於所受傷害的數值。這個減損持續直到該生物完成一次長休。若目標因為這個效果而導致生命值最大值歸零，則目標死亡。

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: 蜘蛛可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

trait.name: 蛛網感知
entries: 當與蛛網保持接觸時，蜘蛛可以知道任何其他與同一張蛛網接觸生物的確切位置。

trait.name: 蛛網行者
entries: 蜘蛛無視蛛網所造成的移動限制。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}1 穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 9的體質豁免，否則受到2({@damage 1d4})毒素傷害。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: 魔鬼視界
entries: 魔法黑暗並不會阻礙devil的黑暗視覺。

trait.name: 飛掠
entries: The devil在飛出敵人的觸及範圍時不會觸發藉機攻擊。

trait.name: Limited Spines
entries: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The devil 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 2d4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Fork
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Tail Spine
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程20/80呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}1 劈砍傷害。

action.name: 短弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 6}，射程40/160呎，單一目標。{@h}1 穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 10的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1分鐘。若此豁免檢定的結果與目標值差距5點或更多，則{@condition 中毒}的目標將陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態長達相同的持續時間，或直到它受到傷害或另一個生物使用一個動作將它搖醒。

action.name: 真心視界
entries: 小妖精觸碰一個生物並以魔法得知該生物當下的情緒狀態。若該目標在一次DC 10的魅力豁免中失敗，則小妖精也將得知該生物的陣營。天界生物、邪魔、和不死生物將在這個豁免檢定中自動失敗。

action.name: 隱形
entries: 小妖精用魔法使自己{@condition 隱形}，直到它攻擊、施放法術、或它的專注被打斷（如同專注於法術）。任何小妖精穿戴或攜帶的裝備都會隨著它隱形。

trait.name: 巧妙動作
entries: 在它的每個回合，密探可以使用一個附贈動作以採取{@action 疾走}、{@action 撤離}、或{@action 躲藏}動作。

trait.name: 偷襲 (1/回合)
entries: 當密探以武器攻擊命中一個目標時，若該攻擊檢定具有優勢，或者該攻擊檢定沒有劣勢且密探有一個未{@condition 無力}的隊友距離目標5呎內，則密探造成額外的7 ({@dice 2d6})傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 密探進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 短劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 手弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Steam Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell 朦朧術}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Day)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

action.name: 血液吸取
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害，且蚊蝠將附著在目標上。當附著於目標時，蚊蝠不會攻擊，但會在每次牠的回合開始時，使目標因喪失血液而失去5 ({@dice 1d4 + 3})點生命值。
蚊蝠可以藉由消耗牠的5呎移動速度來解除附著狀態。牠會在吸取10點生命值或目標死亡後這麼做。包括目標在內的一個生物可以使用一個動作以使蚊蝠解除附著。

trait.name: 岩地偽裝
entries: 巨人在岩石地形為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 巨人進行二次巨棍攻擊。

action.name: 巨棍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 投石
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 9}，射程60/240呎，單一目標。{@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 17的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

reaction.name: 接住岩石
entries: 若一塊岩石或相似的物體被投向巨人，則巨人可以藉由成功通過一次DC 10的敏捷豁免，接住投射物並免於承受來自它的鈍擊傷害。

variant.name: 新巨人選項
entries: 有些成年的石巨人喜歡抓住敵人並將它們拋向空中。它們也可以讓巨石滾過地面，攻擊直線上的複數敵人。這些能力透過下列動作選項呈現。

entries.name: 拋擲
entries: 巨人嘗試將一個距離它10呎內且體型為小型或中型的生物丟出去。目標必須成功通過一次DC 17的敏捷豁免，否則將被向著巨人所選的方向拋擲並水平飛出最多60呎距離，以{@condition 伏地}狀態著地，並受到被扔出每10呎距離3 ({@damage 1d6})的鈍擊傷害。

entries.name: 滾石
entries: 巨人投出一顆岩石，沿著地面滾動並波及30呎長，5呎寬的直線範圍。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 17的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗將受到22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6})鈍擊傷害，並陷入{@condition 伏地}狀態。

monster.name: 石魔像

immune.preNote: 非精金武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: 理解它製造者所掌握的語言，但不會說

trait.name: 不變形態
entries: 魔像免疫於任何會改變它形態的法術或效果。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 魔像在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 魔法武器
entries: 魔像的武器攻擊視作魔法攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 魔像進行二次猛擊攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 緩速 {@recharge 5}
entries: 魔像選擇一個或多個距離它10呎內且它所能看見的生物做為目標。每個目標都必須進行一次DC 17的睿知豁免以對抗這個魔法。若豁免失敗，目標將無法使用反應，它的速度減半，且在它的回合不能進行超過一次攻擊。此外，目標只能在它的回合採取一個動作或一個附贈動作，而不能在同一回合使用兩者。這些效果持續長達1分鐘。目標可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 巨人可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 巨人進行二次巨劍攻擊。

action.name: 巨劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 14}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 投石
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 14}，射程60/240呎，單一目標。{@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 閃電打擊{@recharge 5}
entries: 巨人向距離它500呎內它所能看見的一點投出一道魔法閃電束。每個距離該點10呎內的生物都必須進行一次DC 17的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗將受到54 ({@damage 12d8})閃電傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

variant.name: 新巨人選項
entries: 有些成年的風暴巨人可以引導雷鳴能量通過它們的身體，並以一次震耳欲聾的踏步將其釋放出來。這個能力透過下列動作選項呈現。

entries.name: 雷鳴重踏{@recharge 6}
entries: 風暴巨人重踏地面，引發霹靂雷鳴。所有距離巨人15呎內的其他生物必須成功通過一次DC 17的體質豁免，否則受到33 ({@damage 6d10})雷鳴傷害，且被{@condition 耳聾}直到巨人的下個回合開始。若豁免成功，該生物只會受到一半的傷害且不會{@condition 耳聾}。這道雷鳴可以在最遠1,200呎的距離外被聽到。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 巨人的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 17）。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has {@condition charmed}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only one target {@condition charmed} at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature {@condition charmed} by it or a willing creature. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

trait.name: 回聲定位
entries: 集群在{@condition 耳聾}時無法使用牠的盲視。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺
entries: 集群在依賴聽覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型蝙蝠通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 2d4})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成2 ({@damage 1d4})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型昆蟲通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 4d4})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成5 ({@damage 2d4})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型昆蟲通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

action.name: 螫咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 4d4})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成5 ({@damage 2d4})穿刺傷害。
一個被蜈蚣群使生命值歸零的目標將穩定傷勢，但陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1小時，這個狀態即使在目標回復生命值之後仍會持續。且目標若因此而{@condition 中毒}，則將連帶陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型昆蟲通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

action.name: 螫咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 4d4})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成5 ({@damage 2d4})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型蛇通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d6})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成3 ({@damage 1d6})穿刺傷害。目標必須進行一次DC 10的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到14 ({@damage 4d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

trait.name: 鮮血狂熱
entries: 集群在對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型食人魚通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

trait.name: 水下呼吸
entries: 集群只能在水下呼吸。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d6})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成7 ({@damage 2d6})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 集群在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型老鼠通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d6})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成3 ({@damage 1d6})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型渡鴉通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d6})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成3 ({@damage 1d6})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型昆蟲通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: 蜘蛛可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

trait.name: 蛛網感知
entries: 當與蛛網保持接觸時，蜘蛛可以知道任何其他與同一張蛛網接觸生物的確切位置。

trait.name: 蛛網行者
entries: 蜘蛛無視蛛網所造成的移動限制。

action.name: 螫咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 4d4})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成5 ({@damage 2d4})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型昆蟲通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

action.name: 螫咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 4d4})穿刺傷害，或若集群的生命值等於或低於一半時則造成5 ({@damage 2d4})穿刺傷害。

immune.preNote: 非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The tarrasque 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Reflective Carapace
entries: Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a magic missile spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

trait.name: 攻城怪物
entries: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The tarrasque can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 19}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10})穿刺傷害。 If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 19}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 19}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 19}，觸及20呎，單一目標。{@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10})鈍擊傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 20的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: 駭人威儀
entries: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the tarrasque's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 ({@damage 16d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns.

If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or tail attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

trait.name: 變色甲殼
entries: 斯里克林螳螂人可以改變它甲殼的顏色以模擬周遭環境的色彩與質感。因此，它在為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 立定跳躍
entries: 斯里克林螳螂人的跳遠距離最多30呎、且跳高距離最多15呎，無論有沒有助跑都一樣。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 斯里克林螳螂人進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 11的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1分鐘。若此豁免檢定的結果與目標值差距5點或更多，則因此{@condition 中毒}的目標也將連帶陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態。{@condition 中毒}的目標可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1})劈砍傷害。

variant.name: 斯里克林螳螂人的武器和靈能
entries: 有些斯里克林螳螂人會使用特殊的軍用武器。螳螂戟(Gythka)是一種在兩端各有一片斧刃的雙手長柄武器。三稜梭(Chatkcha)則是一種由三片鋸齒刀刃組成的三角扁平武器（一種輕型投擲武器）。一個裝備著螳螂戟和三稜梭的斯里克林螳螂人將會獲得下列動作選項：

entries.name: 武器多重攻擊
entries: 斯里克林螳螂人進行二次螳螂戟攻擊或二次三稜梭攻擊。

entries.name: 螳螂戟
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})劈砍傷害。

entries.name: 三稜梭
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 斯里克林螳螂人(靈能)
monster.languages: 斯里克林語、心靈感應60呎

trait.name: 變色甲殼
entries: 斯里克林螳螂人可以改變它甲殼的顏色以模擬周遭環境的色彩與質感。因此，它在為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 立定跳躍
entries: 斯里克林螳螂人的跳遠距離最多30呎、且跳高距離最多15呎，無論有沒有助跑都一樣。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 斯里克林螳螂人進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 11的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1分鐘。若此豁免檢定的結果與目標值差距5點或更多，則因此{@condition 中毒}的目標也將連帶陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態。{@condition 中毒}的目標可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1})劈砍傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法 (靈能)
headerEntries: 斯里克林螳螂人的天生施法屬性為睿知。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何構材：
will: {@spell 法師之手}（這隻手為隱形狀態）

variant.name: 斯里克林螳螂人的武器和靈能
entries: 有些斯里克林螳螂人會使用特殊的軍用武器。螳螂戟(Gythka)是一種在兩端各有一片斧刃的雙手長柄武器。三稜梭(Chatkcha)則是一種由三片鋸齒刀刃組成的三角扁平武器（一種輕型投擲武器）。一個裝備著螳螂戟和三稜梭的斯里克林螳螂人將會獲得下列動作選項：

entries.name: 武器多重攻擊
entries: 斯里克林螳螂人進行二次螳螂戟攻擊或二次三稜梭攻擊。

entries.name: 螳螂戟
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})劈砍傷害。

entries.name: 三稜梭
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 暴徒
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若暴徒有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則暴徒在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 暴徒進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 硬頭錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 重弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 2}，射程100/400呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d10})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 老虎在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 猛撲
entries: 若老虎向著一個生物直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次爪抓攻擊命中它，則目標必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。若目標{@condition 伏地}，則老虎能夠以一次附贈動作對它進行一次啃咬攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 擬形
entries: While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: 攻城怪物
entries: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The treant makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 10}，射程60/180呎，單一目標。{@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若勇士有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則勇士在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 踐踏衝鋒
entries: 若三角龍向著一個生物直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次角撞攻擊命中它，則目標必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。若目標{@condition 伏地}，則三角龍能夠以一次附贈動作對它進行一次踩踏攻擊。

action.name: 角撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 踩踏
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一{@condition 伏地}生物。{@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 公理之念
entries: 三元冢無法被強迫去進行違背其天性或指示的行動。

trait.name: 解體
entries: 若三元冢死亡，它的身體將瓦解成塵，留下它的武器和任何它所攜帶的其它東西。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 三元冢進行三次拳擊攻擊或三次標槍攻擊。

action.name: 拳擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害。

variant.name: 遊蕩魔冢
entries: 一個魔冢單元有時候會變得殘缺，無論是因為自然的衰敗、或是因為暴露於混亂力量之下。遊蕩魔冢不會依循奇點的意願或指令行動，它們破壞律法、違背命令、甚至會訴諸於暴力。其他魔冢將會獵殺這類遊盪魔冢。
一個遊蕩魔冢失去公理之念特質，且屬於任何不是守序中立的陣營。除此之外，它們具有和同階級尋常魔冢相同的數據資料。

trait.name: 變色皮膚
entries: 戰蜥人在為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 惡臭
entries: 任何除了戰蜥人以外在距離戰蜥人5呎內開始它回合的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 12的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態直到該生物的下個回合開始。若此豁免成功，該生物將免疫於所有戰蜥人的惡臭長達1小時。

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，戰蜥人在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 戰蜥人進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: The troll在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

variant.name: Loathsome Limbs
entries: Whenever the troll takes at least 15 slashing damage at one time, roll a {@dice d20} to determine what else happens to it:

items.name: 1–10:
items.entry: Nothing else happens.

items.name: 11–14:
items.entry: One leg is severed from the troll if it has any legs left.

items.name: 15–18:
items.entry: One arm is severed from the troll if it has any arms left.

items.name: 19–20:
items.entry: The troll is decapitated, but the troll dies only if it can't regenerate. If it dies, so does the severed head.

entries: If the troll finishes a short or long rest without reattaching a severed limb or head, the part regrows. At that point, the severed part dies. Until then, a severed part acts on the troll's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 13, 10 hit points, and the troll's Regeneration trait.
A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.

A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll unless the troll can see the arm and its target. Each time the troll loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.

If its head is severed, the troll loses its bite attack and its body is {@condition blinded} unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet and the troll's 敏銳嗅覺 trait. It can make a bite attack but only against a target in its space.

The troll's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls {@condition prone}. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 枯枝怪
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 擬形
entries: 當枯枝怪保持不動，它看起來就跟枯死的灌木叢一模一樣。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 霸王龍進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次尾擊。牠不能對同一個目標進行這二次攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個體型為中型或更小的生物，則它{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 17)。直到擒抱結束前，目標被{@condition 束縛}，且霸王龍不能對另一個目標使用啃咬。

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The ultroloth 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The ultroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The ultroloth can use its Hypnotic Gaze and makes three melee attacks.

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Hypnotic Gaze
entries: The ultroloth's eyes sparkle with opalescent light as it targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the ultroloth, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be {@condition charmed} until the end of the ultroloth's next turn. The {@condition charmed} target is {@condition stunned}. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the ultroloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The ultroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day)
entries: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
An ultroloth has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d6} {@creature mezzoloth}s, {@dice 1d4} {@creature nycaloth}s, or one ultroloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The ultroloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The ultroloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monster.name: 土巨怪
monster.senses: 黑暗視覺120呎, 震顫感知60呎

trait.name: 困惑凝視
entries: 當一個生物在距離土巨怪30呎內，且能看見土巨怪雙眼的位置開始它的回合，則除非土巨怪處於{@condition 無力}，可以使用魔法迫使它進行一次DC 15的魅力豁免。
若豁免失敗，則直到它的下個回合開始，該生物不能採取反應，且必須骰一顆{@dice d8}以決定它在這回合間的行動。若結果為1~4，該生物不會做任何事。若結果為5~6，該生物不採取動作，而是使用它所有的移動速度向著任意方向移動。若結果為7~8，該生物對一個隨機生物進行一次近戰攻擊，惑若沒有生物在它的觸及範圍內，則不做任何事。
除非被突襲，否則生物可以移開視線以避免在它的回合開始時進行豁免檢定。若該生物這麼做，則它直到它的下個回合開始前都將無法看見土巨怪，且它可以在下個回合開始時再次選擇移開視線。在該生物看向土巨怪的瞬間，它就必須立刻進行該豁免檢定。

trait.name: 掘道者
entries: 土巨怪能夠以它掘地速度一半的速度掘穿堅硬的岩層，並在身後留下一個5呎寬，8呎高的地道。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 土巨怪進行三次攻擊：二次爪抓，一次大顎。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 大顎
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若unicorn向著一個目標直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次horn攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的9 ({@damage 2d8})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 15的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The unicorn 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

action.name: Teleport (1/Day)
entries: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

legendary.name: Hooves
entries: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendary.name: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

legendary.name: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The unicorn magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monster.name: Vampire
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then {@condition paralyzed} until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: vampire可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place, the vampire is {@condition paralyzed} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
entries: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})鈍擊傷害。 Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 18).

action.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

action.name: Charm
entries: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be {@condition charmed} by the vampire. The {@condition charmed} target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.

Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
entries: The vampire magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats|mm|bats} or {@creature swarm of rats|mm|rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature wolf|mm|wolves} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The vampire makes one bite attack.

monster.name: Vampire Spawn
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: vampire可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.
{@i Stake to the Heart.} The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3})劈砍傷害。 Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 13).

monster.name: Vampire Spellcaster
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then {@condition paralyzed} until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place, the vampire is {@condition paralyzed} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

entries: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vampire is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The vampire has the following wizard spells prepared:

monster.name: Vampire Warrior

While outdoors, the vampire can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature wolf|mm|wolves} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

entries: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The vampire makes one bite attack.

monster.name: 老兵
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 老兵進行二次長劍攻擊。若它已經抽出一把短劍，則它可以再進行一次短劍攻擊。

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})劈砍傷害，或若以雙手使用時 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})劈砍傷害

action.name: 短劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 重弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程100/400呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 枯藤怪
monster.senses: 盲視60呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 擬形
entries: 當枯藤怪保持不動，它看起來就跟糾纏成團的藤蔓一模一樣。

action.name: 絞纏
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})鈍擊傷害，且體型為大型或更小的目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 12)。直到擒抱結束前，該目標被{@condition 束縛}，且枯藤怪不能絞纏另一個目標。

action.name: 纏身植被 {@recharge 5}
entries: 攫抓鬚根和藤蔓在以枯藤怪為中心的15呎半徑範圍內蔓生而出，並在1分鐘後枯萎死去。在持續期間，這個區域對非植物生物而言為困難地形。此外，在植被出現時處於範圍內，每個由枯藤怪所選擇的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 12的力量豁免，否則被{@condition 束縛}。一個生物可以使用它的動作以進行一次DC 12的力量檢定，若成功則將自己或觸及範圍內另一個被糾纏的生物給釋放。

monster.name: 紫蕈
monster.senses: 盲視30呎（超過半徑範圍則視作目盲）

trait.name: 擬形
entries: 當紫蕈保持不動，它看起來就跟普通的蕈類一模一樣。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 紫蕈進行{@dice 1d4}次腐壞之觸攻擊。

action.name: 腐壞之觸
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d8})死靈傷害。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 弗洛魔在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 弗洛魔進行二次攻擊：一次喙啄，一次禽爪。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 禽爪
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 孢子 {@recharge}
entries: 一團15呎半徑的劇毒孢子雲從弗洛魔身上擴散。這團孢子雲會繞過轉角。每個在範圍內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 14的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態。當因此而{@condition 中毒}時，目標將在它的每個回合開始時受到5 ({@damage 1d10})毒素傷害。目標可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。將整瓶的{@item 聖水(扁瓶裝)|phb|聖水}潑在目標上也能結束這個效果對它的影響。

action.name: 震懾尖嘯 (1/Day)
entries: 弗洛魔發出一陣恐怖的尖嘯。每個距離它20呎內，可以聽見它，且不是惡魔的生物必須成功通過一次DC 14的體質豁免，否則被{@condition 震懾}直到弗洛魔的下個回合結束。

variant.name: 召喚惡魔 (1/日)
entries: 該惡魔選擇要召喚什麼，並嘗試進行一次魔法召喚。
一個弗洛魔有{@chance 30|30％|30％召喚機率}機率召喚出{@dice 2d4}個{@creature 怯魔}或一個弗洛魔。
被召喚的惡魔將出現距離它召喚者60呎內的一處未被佔據空間，做為召喚者的盟友行動，且不能再召喚其它惡魔。它會持續存在長達1分鐘，直到它或它的召喚者死亡、或直到召喚者以一個動作解消它。

trait.name: 敏銳視覺和嗅覺
entries: 禿鷲在依賴視覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若禿鷲有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則禿鷲在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 喙啄
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 踐踏衝鋒
entries: 若戰馬向著一個生物直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次蹄擊攻擊命中它，則目標必須成功通過一次DC 14的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。若目標{@condition 伏地}，則戰馬能夠以一次附贈動作再對它進行一次蹄擊攻擊。

action.name: 蹄擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

variant.name: 戰馬護甲
entries: 一匹著甲的戰馬有著基於它所穿戴護馬鎧甲類型的AC（更多資訊請參見《玩家手冊》的「護馬鎧甲」）。馬的AC包含其可應用的敏捷調整值。護馬鎧甲並不會影響馬匹的挑戰等級。

action.name: 蹄擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 流水形體
entries: 水元素可以進入一個敵對生物所在的空間並在該處停下。它也可以移動穿越最窄1吋的狹窄空間而不用擠縮身體。

trait.name: 凍結
entries: 若水元素受到寒冰傷害，它身體的一部分將被凍結；直到它的下個回合結束前，它的移動速度降低20呎。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 水元素進行二次猛擊攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 淹沒 {@recharge 4}
entries: 每個在水元素所在空間的生物都必須進行一次DC 15的力量豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將受到13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})鈍擊傷害。若它的體型為大型或更小，它也將被{@condition 擒抱}（逃脫DC 14）。直到擒抱結束前，目標被{@condition 束縛}且無法呼吸（除非它能在水下呼吸）。若豁免成功，目標將被推出水元素所在的空間。
水元素可以同時擒抱一個大型生物或最多二個體型為中型或更小的生物。在水元素的每個回合開始時，每個被它{@condition 擒抱}的生物將受到13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})鈍擊傷害。一個距離水元素5尺內的生物可以藉由採取一個動作以進行並成功通過一次DC 14的力量檢定，以將一個生物或物體從水元素體內拉出。

trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The water weird is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in water.

trait.name: Water Bound
entries: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害。 If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 ft. toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 鼬鼠在依賴聽覺或嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}1 穿刺傷害。

monster.name: (獸化)熊人

walk.condition: (熊或半熊人型態下則為40呎, 攀爬30呎)

immune.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: 通用語 (不能在熊型態下說話)

trait.name: 變形者
entries: 熊人可以使用它的動作以變形成一個大型的半熊類人或一隻大型的熊，或變回它類人生物的真實型態。除了它的體型和AC之外，它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備並不會隨著變形發生轉變。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 熊人在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 在熊型態下，熊人進行二次爪抓攻擊。在類人型態下，它進行二次巨斧攻擊。在半熊人型態下，它可以像熊型態或類人型態一樣進行攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬 (限定熊或半熊人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個類人生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 14的體質豁免，否則將被熊人獸化症給詛咒。

action.name: 爪抓 (限定熊或半熊人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 巨斧 (限定類人或半熊人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4})劈砍傷害。

variant.name: 非人類獸化者
entries: 這個欄目中所提供的數據是以人類做為獸化症的基礎生物。然而，你也可以使用這個數據以呈現非人類獸化者，並藉由讓非人類獸化者保留一個或多個它的類人屬性特質以添加真實感。舉例來說，一名精靈狼人可能會保有「精類血統特性」。

monster.name: (獸化)野豬人

immune.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: 通用語 (不能在野豬型態下說話)

trait.name: 變形者
entries: 野豬人可以使用它的動作以變形成一個半野豬類人或一隻野豬，或變回它類人生物的真實型態。除了它的AC之外，它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備並不會隨著變形發生轉變。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。

trait.name: 衝鋒 (限定野豬或半野豬人型態)
entries: 若野豬人向著一個目標直線移動至少15呎並接著在同回合以一次獠牙攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的7 (2d6)劈砍傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 頑強 (短休或長休之後充能)
entries: 若野豬人受到14點或更低的傷害而使其生命值歸零，則改為將它的生命值減少至1。

action.name: 多重攻擊 (限定類人或半野豬人型態)
entries: 野豬人進行二次攻擊，其中只有一次可以是獠牙攻擊。

action.name: 巨鎚 (限定類人或半野豬人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 獠牙 (限定野豬或半野豬人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。若目標為一個類人生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 12的體質豁免，否則將被野豬人獸化症給詛咒。

variant.name: 非人類獸化者
entries: 這個欄目中所提供的數據是以人類做為獸化症的基礎生物。然而，你也可以使用這個數據以呈現非人類獸化者，並藉由讓非人類獸化者保留一個或多個它的類人屬性特質以添加真實感。舉例來說，一名精靈狼人可能會保有「精類血統特性」。

immune.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.senses: 黑暗視覺60呎 (限定鼠型態)
monster.languages: 通用語 (不能在鼠型態下說話)

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: 鼠人在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊 (限定類人或半鼠人型態)
entries: 鼠人進行二次攻擊，其中只有一次可以是啃咬攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬 (限定鼠或半鼠人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個類人生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 11的體質豁免，否則將被鼠人獸化症給詛咒。

action.name: 短劍 (限定類人或半鼠人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 手弩 (限定類人或半鼠人型態)
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程30/120呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

variant.name: 非人類獸化者
entries: 這個欄目中所提供的數據是以人類做為獸化症的基礎生物。然而，你也可以使用這個數據以呈現非人類獸化者，並藉由讓非人類獸化者保留一個或多個它的類人屬性特質以添加真實感。舉例來說，一名精靈狼人可能會保有「精類血統特性」。

monster.name: (獸化)虎人

immune.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: 通用語 (不能在虎型態下說話)

trait.name: 變形者
entries: 虎人可以使用它的動作以變形成一個半虎類人或一隻老虎，或變回它類人生物的真實型態。除了它的體型之外，它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備並不會隨著變形發生轉變。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 虎人在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 猛撲 (限定虎或半虎人型態)
entries: 若虎人向著一個生物直線移動至少15呎並接著在同回合以一次爪抓攻擊命中它，則目標必須成功通過一次DC 14的力量豁免，否則被擊倒伏地{@condition 伏地}。若目標{@condition 伏地}，則老虎能夠以一次附贈動作對它進行一次啃咬攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊 (限定類人或半虎人型態)
entries: 在類人型態下，虎人進行二次彎刀攻擊或二次長弓攻擊。在半虎人型態下，它可以像類人型態一樣攻擊或進行二次爪抓攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬 (限定虎或半虎人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個類人生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則將被虎人獸化症給詛咒。

action.name: 爪抓 (限定虎或半虎人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 彎刀 (限定類人或半虎人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 長弓 (限定類人或半虎人型態)
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

variant.name: 非人類獸化者
entries: 這個欄目中所提供的數據是以人類做為獸化症的基礎生物。然而，你也可以使用這個數據以呈現非人類獸化者，並藉由讓非人類獸化者保留一個或多個它的類人屬性特質以添加真實感。舉例來說，一名精靈狼人可能會保有「精類血統特性」。

monster.name: (獸化)狼人

immune.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

monster.languages: 通用語 (不能在狼型態下說話)

trait.name: 變形者
entries: 狼人可以使用它的動作以變形成一個半狼類人或一隻狼，或變回它類人生物的真實型態。除了它的AC之外，它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備並不會隨著變形發生轉變。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 狼人在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊 (限定類人或半狼人型態)
entries: 狼人進行二次攻擊：二次矛攻擊（類人型態）、或一次啃咬，一次爪抓（半狼人型態）。

action.name: 啃咬 (限定狼或半狼人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個類人生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 12的體質豁免，否則將被狼人獸化症給詛咒。

action.name: 爪抓 (限定半狼人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 矛 (限定類人型態)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

variant.name: 非人類獸化者
entries: 這個欄目中所提供的數據是以人類做為獸化症的基礎生物。然而，你也可以使用這個數據以呈現非人類獸化者，並藉由讓非人類獸化者保留一個或多個它的類人屬性特質以添加真實感。舉例來說，一名精靈狼人可能會保有「精類血統特性」。

monster.name: 白龍幼龍
monster.senses: 盲視10呎, 黑暗視覺60呎

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害加 2 ({@damage 1d4})寒冰傷害。

action.name: 寒冰吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 白龍吐出一道15呎錐形的冰雪爆風。每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 12的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到22 ({@damage 5d8})寒冰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

resist.preNote: 非銀製武器且非魔法攻擊所造成的

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，屍妖在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 屍妖進行二次長劍攻擊或二次長弓攻擊。它可以使用生命吸取以取代其中一次長劍攻擊。

action.name: 生命吸取
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})死靈傷害。目標必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則它的生命值最大值將減少等同於所受傷害的數值。這個減損持續直到目標完成一次長休。若目標因為這個效果而導致生命值最大值歸零，則目標死亡。
一個被此攻擊殺死的類人生物將在24小時之後做為一個處於屍妖控制下的{@creature 殭屍}升起，除非該類人生物在那之前被復活、或它的屍體被摧毀。屍妖可以同時擁有不超過十二個處於它控制之下的{@creature 殭屍}。

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})劈砍傷害，或若以雙手使用則造成 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 長弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: Will-o'-Wisp
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Consume Life
entries: As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Ephemeral
entries: The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Variable Illumination
entries: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

action.name: Shock
entries: {@atk ms} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become {@condition invisible} until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，狗頭人在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若狗頭人有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則狗頭人在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 落石
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 5}，單一位於夠頭人正下方的目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: The wolf在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若wolf有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則wolf在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The wolf has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 14的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 狼在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若狼有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則狼在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})穿刺傷害，且若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 11的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

trait.name: 敏銳聽覺和嗅覺
entries: 座狼在依賴聽覺和嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。若目標為一個生物，則它必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

monster.name: Wraith

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當處於日光照耀下時，wraith在攻擊檢定，以及依賴視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有劣勢。

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Create Specter
entries: The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a {@creature specter} in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The {@creature specter} is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 飛龍進行二次攻擊：一次啃咬，一次釘刺。在飛行時，它可以使用它的爪抓攻擊取代其中一次攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 釘刺
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。目標必須進行一次DC 15的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到24 ({@damage 7d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

resist.note: and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the yeti takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: 敏銳嗅覺
entries: The yeti在依賴嗅覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and then be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

monster.name: 蠟融妖
monster.languages: 深淵語、精靈語、地底通用語

trait.name: 變形者
entries: 蠟融妖可以使用它的動作以變形成類似於一個女性卓爾、或一隻巨蜘蛛的型態，或者變回它的真實型態。它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備不會隨著變形發生轉變。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 蠟融妖在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 蛛行
entries: 蠟融妖可以爬越困難表面，包括倒吊在天花板上，而無須進行屬性檢定。

trait.name: 蛛網行者
entries: 蠟融妖無視蛛網所造成的移動限制。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 蠟融妖進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊（蜘蛛型態則為啃咬）
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎（惡魔型態則為10呎），單一目標。{@h}5 ({@dice 1d6 + 2})鈍擊（蜘蛛型態則為穿刺）傷害加 21 ({@damage 6d6})毒素傷害。

action.name: 迷霧型態
entries: 蠟融妖轉化成一團劇毒迷霧，或變回它的真實型態。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備將隨之轉變。它會在死亡時回復它的真實型態。
當處於迷霧型態時，蠟融妖處於{@condition 無力}狀態，且無法說話。它具有30呎的飛行速度，可以浮空，且可以穿越任何非密封的空間。它在力量、敏捷、和體質豁免中具有優勢，且免疫於所有非魔法傷害。
當處於迷霧型態時，蠟融妖可以進入一個生物所在的空間並停在該處。每次該生物在蠟融妖所在的空間開始它的回合時，該生物都必須成功通過一次DC 14的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態直到它的下個回合開始。當目標因此處於{@condition 中毒}狀態時，它將連帶陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 蠟融妖的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 14）。蠟融妖天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

variant.name: 召喚惡魔 (1/日)
entries: 該惡魔選擇要召喚什麼，並嘗試進行一次魔法召喚。
一個蠟融妖有{@chance 50|50％|50％召喚機率}機率召喚出另一個蠟融妖。
被召喚的惡魔將出現距離它召喚者60呎內的一處未被佔據空間，做為召喚者的盟友行動，且不能再召喚其它惡魔。它會持續存在長達1分鐘，直到它或它的召喚者死亡、或直到召喚者以一個動作解消它。

monster.senses: 盲視30呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

items.name: 緩速吐息：

items.entry: 銀龍吐出一道30呎錐形的麻痺毒氣。每個在吐息範圍內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 17的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在每次它的回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若檢定成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

monster.name: 少年白龍
monster.senses: 盲視30呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 冰上行走
entries: 白龍可以移動穿過或攀爬冰面而無須進行屬性檢定。此外，冰或雪構成的困難地形不會使它消耗額外的移動速度。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 白龍進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4})穿刺傷害加 4 ({@damage 1d8})寒冰傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 寒冰吐息 {@recharge 5}
entries: 白龍吐出一道30呎錐形的冰雪爆風。每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 15的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到45 ({@damage 10d8})寒冰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Large snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The yuan-ti 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: Multiattack (Abomination Form Only)
entries: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or three melee attacks, but can use its bite and constrict attacks only once each.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target.

action.name: Scimitar (Abomination Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Longbow (Abomination Form Only)
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 6}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Abomination Form Only)
headerEntries: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: The yuan-ti 在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Malison Type
entries: The yuan-ti has one of the following types:
Type 1: Human body with snake head
Type 2: Human head and body with snakes for arms
Type 3: Human head and upper body with a serpentine lower body instead of legs

action.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
entries: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks, but can use its bite only once.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow (Yuan-ti Form Only)
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程150/600呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

headerEntries: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 蛇人在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 蛇人進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 短弓
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程80/320呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害加 7 ({@damage 2d6})毒素傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 蛇人的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 12）。蛇人天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

monster.name: 殭屍
monster.languages: 理解所有它生前掌握的語言，但不會說

trait.name: 不死韌性
entries: 若殭屍因受到傷害而使生命值歸零，除非該傷害為光耀傷害或來自重擊，否則它必須進行一次DC 5+所受傷害值的體質豁免。若豁免成功，則改為將它的生命值減少至1。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})鈍擊傷害。
